title: 1 - Omba Lipenga
content:
#  1 - Omba Lipenga

 1 Mlonda lalika uthenga, Chenjeza anthu onse,  Iye wakumva adzetu, Nakhale nawo moyo. CHORUS:  Omba Lipenga mlonda’we, Anthu onse amvetu,  Lalika  atero Mlungu! Onse amasulidwe. 2 Lalika m’mapiri monse, M’nkhalango ndi m’madambo;Lalikiranso mzinyanja, Ndi nyimbo yokondwera.  3 Lalikira ponse ponse, kumene kuli mdima;  Amve kuti zonse zapsa, Atate alindira.4 Lalikira kwa othodwa, Akufuna mpumulo; Yesu ali kuitana, Idzani kwa inetu.

title: 2 - Indetu Pakhomo
content:
# 2 - Indetu Pakhomo

 1 Mfumu yathu ili kudza, Yomwe inafera ife; Koma olungama okha, Adzapita nawo.CHORUS:   Indetu pakhomo Ali pafupitu pakhomo,   Ali kudza (inde) ali kudza (Mbuye) Inde ali pakhomo. 2 Zizindikiro zakezo, Zili kukwanitsidwatu, Posachedwa tidzamona, Akudza m’mitambo.   3  Musayang’ane pa dziko, Kupeza mtendere wathu,  Mpaka Yesu adzabwera Kudzachotsa imfa. 4 Pompo m’dziko latsopano Tidzakhalamo kosatha, Imfa sidzakhala uko, Ku nthawi zosatha.

title: 3 - Maso Ndi Maso
content:
# 3 - Maso Ndi Maso 

 1 Maso ndi maso ndi Khristu, Kodi ndidzachitanji?  Mmene ndidzaona Yesu, Yemwe anandifera.CHORUS:   N’dzamona maso ndi maso, Kuseri kwa mitambo;   Posachedwa ndidzamona, Mulemerero wace!  2 Tsopano ndimona Iye, Mwa chizimezimetu,  Tsiku lija ndidzaona, Ulemerero wache.   3  Pamene zowawa zonse, Nthenda ndi imfa zitha,  Dziko likadzakonzedwa, Ndidzakondwa koposa!4 Lodala tsikulo m’mene! Ndidzamuona Yesu, Mpulumutsi wanga yemwe, Anandikonda ine.

title: 4 - Ali Kudza
content:
# 4 - Ali Kudza 

 1 Timamva uthenga wabwinotu, M’mene tiri kunka kwathu; Msanga Mpulumutsi adzabwera, Kukhala Mfumu yathu.CHORUS: Ali kudza posacedwa, Inde ali kudza pa dzikoli; Ndipo tidzapita tonse kumwamba, Pakubwera Yesuyo. 2 Manda a anthu oyera mtima, Adzatsegulidwa ndithu; Ndipo onse ogonera m’mandamo, Adzakhalanso moyo. 3 Sitidzalekananso kwathu ko, Tidzayimba za chombolo; Anthu a mitundu yonse adzadza, Kupembedza Mfumuyo. 4 Tidzayimba aleluya, Amen! Msanga tikasamalira; Dikirani ndi kupemphera nonse, Tidzabvala korona.

title: 5 - Kuli Bwanji Kwathu?
content:
#  5 - Kuli Bwanji Kwathu? 

 1 Kuli bwanji kwathu? Ndinafunsa, mlonda iye nati: Usiku wapita ndithu, kwayandika kucha; Usalire, yendabe ndi chiyembekezo chodala  Mpaka udzafika m’mwamba pa tsiku losatha. 2 Ndafunsa msrikali wa Khristu, iye nayimba nati: Ndidzamenyanatu nkhondo patsala pang’ono. Usalire, pirira kufikira nkhondo idzatha,  Pakuti olakika adzalandira mphotho. 3 Ndinafunsa dziko, nyanja ndi dzuwa izo zinati: Nthawi ili kutha Yesu ali pafupitu, Usalire, zizindikiro zili kuonekatu, Chilengedwe chonse chilindira kudza kwake. 4 Kwathu mpafupitu! mau osangalatsa mtimanga,Omwe adapukuta misozi ya olira, Usalire, tidzakomanatu osalekananso Zobvuta zitatha m’nyumba ya Atate wathu.

title: 6 - Yesu Akudza
content:
#  6 - Yesu Akudza 

 1 Yang’anirani Akristu, Zammwamba zigwedezeka Yatsani nyali zanuzo, Kukomana naye Mbuye.CHORUS:Onani Yesu adza; Akudza mulemerero,Adzakhala mfumu yathu, Onani! Ali kudza. 2 Ona lonjezano lace, Wakhululukira tchimo, Mwazi nutsuka minjiro, Nena nthano ya chombolo. 3 Mafumu anjenjemera, Imva! ali kudza ndithu Nena za cisomo chake, M’mene lipenga lilira. 4 Mitundu yonse idzatha, Khristu wafulumiratu; Dziko lili kutha ndithu; Mbuye wathu ali kudza. 5 Yesu aitana nonse, Akupembedzera inu; Kangaza nthawi ikutha, Ungadzatsaletu kunja.

title: 7 - Yesu Adza Kuwerenga
content:
#  7 - Yesu Adza Kuwerenga 

 1 Yesu adza kuwerenga Ana ’Ke abwino, Ngale zake zowalitsa, Okondedwawo. CHORUS: Ana omwe angonga Nyenyezi za mmwamba, Nadza naye mokondwa, Onyezima nye. 2 Yesu adzasonkhanitsa Oyera mu mtima, Ana ake onyezima, Okondedwawo. 3 Ana, inde, ana ake Ndi nyenyezi zake; Adzakhala owalitsa, Okondedwawo.

title: 8 - Pakwitana Mbuye Wanga
content:
#  8 - Pakwitana Mbuye Wanga 

 1. Pakwitana Mbuye wanga potsiriza dzikoli, Pakufika tsiku la kuwalalo, Posonkhana akumvera, pakuona Yesuyo, Ndidzakondwerera naye komwekoCHORUS:Pakwitana Mbuye wanga (Mbuyanga),Pakwitana Mbuye wanga (Mbuyanga),Pakwitana Mbuye wanga,Ndidzakondwerera naye komweko. 2. Potuluka mmanda mwao, anthu ake onsewo, Tidzasanganatu nao nthawiyo. Pakuuka osankhidwa, kunka naye Yesuyo, Ndidzakondwerera naye komweko. 3. Tisaleke kugwirabe ntchito ya Mulunguyo, Tibukitse mbiri yake mdzikoli, Ndi podzatha moyo wathu ndi zintchito zathuzo, Tidzakondwerera naye komweko.CHORUS (lotsiriza):Pakwitana Mbuye wathu (Mbuyathu),Pakwitana Mbuye wathu (Mbuyathu),Pakwitana Mbuye wathu,Tidzakondwerera naye komweko.

title: 9 - Omba Lipenga
content:
#  9 - Omba Lipenga 

 1. Omba lipenga, limveke ponse; Yesu adzabweranso! Kondweranitu, yimbani nyimbo; Yesu adzabweranso.CHORUS:Abweranso, abweranso, Yesu adzabweranso! 2. Lalikirani m’phiri ndi m’dambo; Yesu adzabweranso! Adzadza m’ulemerero wake; Yesu adzabweranso. 3. Lalikirani m’zinyanja monse; Yesu adzabweranso! Lalikirani ponseponsepo; Yesu adzabweranso.4. Zivomezi zimanena kuti; Yesu adzabweranso! Namondwe ndi mafunde zinena; Yesu adzabweranso. 5. Mitundu yakwiya tidziwatu; Yesu adzabweranso! Zizindikiro zakwanitsidwa; Yesu adzabweranso.

title: 10 - Kodi Tidzasonkhanadi?
content:
#  10 - Kodi Tidzasonkhanadi?

 1. Kodi tidzasonkhanadi, Pali mtsinjewo wa moyo, Wakuyenda nthawi zonse, Kwa Mulungu m’mwambamo.CHORUS:Inde, tikomane komwe, Ku mtsinje wakukoma wa Mulungu;Tisangane ndi olungama. Pa mtsinje m’mwambambo. 2. Pa magombe a pa mtsinje, Tidzayendayenda komwe; Tidzalemekeza Mlungu, Nthawi zonse zonsezo. 3. Tisanadze pa magombe, Tidzatula akatundu. Yesu adzatilandira, ’Dzativeka tonsefe. 4. Msanga tikomane komwe, Potsiriza pa ulendo, Msanga tidzakondwerabe, Timyimbira Mlunguyo.

title: 11 - Ndidzakutsatani
content:
#  11 - Ndidzakutsatani 

 1. Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Kuli konse mupita; Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Inde n’dzakutsatani.CHORUS:Ndidzakutsatani Mbuye, Yemwe munandifera;Ngakhale akukaneni, Ndidzakutsatani ’Nu. 2. Nkana njira ndi ya minga Yopanda matakadzo, Mukandikonzera Ine, Mokondwa n’dzatsata ’nu. 3. Nkana chisautso chidza, Kapena ndiyesedwa; Mbuyenso anayesedwa, Ndidzamtsata mokondwa. 4. Nkana ndipeze mavuto, Sindidzakukanani; Mnazunzidwanso koopsa Ndidzatsatabe Inu. 5. M’mafunde ndi mozamamo, Mudzanditsogolera; M’nayenda m’mafunde kale, Ndidzakutsatani ’Nu.

title: 12 - Kasupe Ali Wodzaza
content:
#  12 - Kasupe Ali Wodzaza 

 1. Kasupe ali wodzaza,Ndi mwazi wa Yesu;  Omwe asamba mwa uyu Ataya zoipa. 2. Woba wakufa napenya, Kasupe nakondwa; Ndi ine enso mwa uyu, Ndisamba ndiyera. 3. Mwazi wa Yesu wokondwa, Ukhala wamphamvu; Kwa ana onse a Mlungu Uchita kuombola. 4. Mmene ndapenya mwazi wa Mabala Anuwo, Kukonda kwanu nditama Kwa kutha kwa moyo. 5. Ndikhulupirira kuti Mwakakonza malo Ndipo ndidzalowa ine Ku moyo wosatha. 6. Kumwamba ndikayimbanso Zamphamvu za Mlungu, Zopulumutsa onsewa Omvana ndi Yesu.

title: 13 - Ndiyeretu Mbu
content:
# 13 - Ndiyeretu Mbu

 1. Ambuye ndifuna nditsukenitu, Mukhalitse ndine mu mtima’ngamu;Muthyole zonsezo zodetsa’netu, Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu!CHORUS:Ndiyere mbu, E, ndiyere mbu,Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.2. Ambuye taonani pansi pano, Kuti m’ndithandize kudzipereka;Ndileke zangazo zoipsa’netu, Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.3. Chifukwa cha ichi ndipempheratu, Ndidikira Inu Ambuyanga ’Nu;Ndikhulupilira pa mwaziwo pyu, Musambitse ine ndiyeretu mbu.4. Ambuye muona ndidikira’Nu, Idzani kukonzetsa mtima wanga;omwe akufuna simuwakana, Musambitse ine, ndiyeretu mbu.

title: 14 - Imva Makobidi
content:
# 14 - Imva Makobidi

 1. Imva makobidi, tili kuponya!Tili kupereka, onse kwa Yesu.CHORUS:Ngwingwi! ngwingwi! Ngwingwi! ngwingwi!Tili kuponya! Tili kupereka, Onse kwa Yesu.2. Tonse tipereka, kobidi lathu;Kuti anthu ena amve za Yesu.3. Pakuperekatu tili kusunga;Tikakula, Mbuye adzatipatsa.4. Makamaka Yesu afuna ife;Kuti tipereke mitima yathu.

title: 15 - Yesu Andikonda ’Ne
content:
# 15 - Yesu Andikonda ’Ne

 1. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Amatero m’bukhumo.Akafoka mwana ’ke, Amlimbitsa Yesuyo.CHORUS:Yesu akonda, akonda ine,Akonda ine, Atero m’bukhumo.2. Nandifera Yesuyo, Nagonjetsa tchimolo,Natsegula khomolo, Kuti ndinke kwawoko.3. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Nkana ndikudwalatu,Mmene ndifookanso, Andisamalira ’ne.4. Yesu andikonda ’ne, Ndikamkonda Iyeyo,’Dzanditenga inetu, Ndikakhale nayedi.

title: 16 - Timapazi Inu, Samalirani
content:
# 16 - Timapazi Inu, Samalirani

 1. Ndasamba m’manja mwanga, Mwayeretsedwatu,Ndi kwapereka iwo, Ku ntchito ya Yesu.CHORUS:Timapazi inu Samalirani,Musanditengere, Kuli zoipa.2. Makutu amvetsere Pa tsiku lonseli,Ntchito yonse yabwino, Manjawa achite.3. Maso anga aone, Ntchito zawo zonse,Kutitu asachimwe, Chifukwa cha Yesu.

title: 17 - Chikondi Chitikondwetsa
content:
# 17 - Chikondi Chitikondwetsa

 1. Chikondi chikondwetsa, Nichikonza njira;Chimatithangata ife, Kukonda anzathu.CHORUS:Mulungu ndiye chikonditu, Ndifetu ana akewo.Chikondi chikondwetsa, Nichikonza njira;Chimatithangata ife, Kukonda anzathu.2. Dzikoli n’la chisoni, La imfa ndi nthenda,Tidzachita mbali yathu, Kuthangata ena.3. Moyo uno ukatha, Tikadzanka m’mwamba,Tidzayimba kosaleka, Za kukonda kwake.

title: 18 - Usamalire Moyo Wanga ’We
content:
# 18 - Usamalire Moyo Wanga ’We

 1. Usamalire ’we, Adani akowo,Ngambiritu mu dzikoli, Angakugwetse ’we.2. Limbika nkhondoyo, Masiku onsewo,Nupempha Mlungu wakoyo, Kukuthangata ’we.3. Usaganize ’we, Kusiya nkhondoyi;Sudzapumula mpakatu, Ambuye abwera.

title: 19 - Akristu Tiyeni
content:
# 19 - Akhristu Tiyeni

 1. Akhristu tiyeni! Nkhondo tigwire,Yesu Mbuye wathu, Atitsogoza, Ona mbuye yekha, Atithandiza;Ndi mbendera yake, Tiyitsatira.CHORUS:Akristu tiyeni! Nkhondo tigwire,Yesu Mbuye wathu, Atitsogoza.2. Nkhondo ya Satana, Msanga ithawa,Akristu tiyeni, Tidzapambana;Mphamvu zake zitha, Yesu titama;Yimbani anzathu Nyimbo tikweza.3. Gulu lalikulu, Adza Akhristu;Titsatana nawo, Ana a Mlungu;Sitipatukana, Tonse tikhala,Ndi mtima umodzi, Timakondana.4. Zonse za pa dziko, Zidzatheratu;Koma mpingo wake, Ukhalitsabe;Mphamvu ya Satana, Idzalefuka;Yesu nalonjeza Ndidzalimbitsa.5. Idzani Akhristu, Kutithandiza,Nyimbo za Mulungu, Tidzayimbitsa;Khristu ayenera, Ndiye Mfumuyo,Tidzamlemekeza, Nthawi zonsezo.

title: 20 - Moyo Wanga Dzuka
content:
# 20 - Moyo Wanga Dzuka 

 1. Moyo wanga dzuka, limba Thamanga ndi mphamvu;Korona wosatha ali, Kulindira iwe.2. Mau a Mulungu wako, Akuitana’we;Dzanja lake likufupa, Ngati ufunitsa.3. Mtambo wa mboni wozinga, Uyang’anira’we;Iwala zonse za m’mbuyo, Pitabe m’tsogolo.4. Mpulumutsi tikokeni, Tiyambe liwiro;Tidze pa mapazi anu, Kutula katundu.

title: 21 - Ndiri Kudza Kwa Yesu
content:
# 21 - Ndiri Kudza Kwa Yesu

 1. Ndiri kudza kwa Yesu, Ndasauka ndachimwa;Zonse zanga ndisiya, Kukapeza moyotu.CHORUS:Yesu ndikhulupira, Munafera inedi,Mwa umphawi ndipempha, Mundipulumutsetu.2. Inde Inu ndifuna, Ndinachimwa kwambiri;Yesu ati, Ndichotsa Zakuipa zakozo.3. Yesu zonse ndipatsa, Zili zanu tsopano,Mtima wanga wonsewu, Muli mwini waketu.4. Ndikukhulupirani, Mwazi wanu ndidziwa,Wayeretsa inenso, Ndapachikwa ndi Khristu.5. Yesu adzandidzaza Mtima wanga wonsewu,Ine ndiri woyera, Yesu wanga nditama.

title: 22 - Inenso
content:
# 22 - Inenso

 1. Mbuye ndamva muchitira, Anthu ena zabwino;Muli kuwadalitsira, Mudalitse inenso.CHORUS:Inenso, inenso, Mudalitse inenso.2. Tate m’sandipitirire, Ndimaipa mtimamo;Ndiyenera imfa, koma Chitireni chifundo.3. Ndinagona mwa zoipa, Ndinakunyozanitu,Dziko lino ndinakonda, Mundikhululukire.4. Mzimu m’sandipitirire, Mupenyetsa akhungu;Munapatsa ena mphamvu, Mpatse mphamvu inenso.

title: 23 - Mundifungatire Ine
content:
# 23 - Mundifungatire Ine 

 1. Mundifungatire ine, Mzimu wakuyera ’Nu,Munditsuke mtima wanga, Inde, Mudze leroli.CHORUS:Mudzetu, mudzetu, Mzimu wakuyera mbu.Munditsuke mtima wanga, Inde, mudze leroli.2. Mzimu, mundidzaze ine, Ndisowatu nzeruzo.Ndisowanso inu, Mbuye, Mundidzaze mtimanga.3. Ine ndine wolefuka, Ndikugwadiranitu.Mzimu Inu mundidzaze Ndi chikondi Chanucho.4. Dalitseni ine, Mzimu, Sambitseni mtimanga.Inu, Msangalatsi wanga, Mudze, inde leroli.

title: 24 - Ndifuna Yesuyo
content:
# 24 - Ndifuna Yesuyo 

 1. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Ambuyanga,M’mtendere ndinkemo, Mwa Iyeyu.CHORUS:Ndifuna Inu, Yesu, Nthawiyi ndifuna,Kwa Yesuyo, Mbuyanga, Ndifunako.2. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Movutamu,Ndipulumukemo Mwa Iyeyu.3. Ndifuna Yesuyo, Mokondwa ndiMowawa, adzemo Ndi moyodi.4. Ndifuna yesuyo, Ndichite ’neZofuna zakezo, Ndidzazebe.5. Ndifuna Yesuyo Woyeratu,Ndikhale wakeyo, Wa Iyeyu.

title: 25 - Ndipereka Zonse
content:
# 25 - Ndipereka Zonse

 1. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Zonse mwa ufulu;Ndidzamkonda Iye koposa, Tsiku lili lonse.CHORUS:Ndiperekatu, zonse kwa Yesu;Zonse kwanu ndipereka dalitsenitu.2. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Pa mapazi ake;Zadziko ndazikana zonse, Nditengeni Yesu.3. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Ndikhale wanutu,Ndimve Mzimu wanu ndidziwe, Kuti ndinu wanga.4. Ndipereka zonse kwa Yesu, Wandipatsa mphamvu.Ndikondwera chipulumutso! Nditama dzinalo!

title: 26 - Ndisauka Ndinachimwa
content:
# 26 - Ndisauka Ndinachimwa 

 1. Ndisauka ndinachimwa, Koma Inu mwandifera,Ndipo ndamva mundi’tana, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.2. Ndisauka ndimasowa, Mphamvu ya kuyera mtima,Mwazi wanu unditsuka; Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.3. Ndisauka, sindikhoza Kwiletsa nkhondo mu mtima,Ndi chisoni, mantha, nkhawa, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.4. Ndisauka sindiona, Ndimadwala ndilefuka,Zonse ndizitaya kwa ’Nu, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.5. Inde, Yesu mulandira, Muchiritsa mpulumutsa,Mau anu ndivomera, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.6. Inde, Yesu, mundikonda, Zonse zina ndazitaya,Tsono kukakhala wanu, Mwana Mlungu ndingobwera.

title: 27 - M’titsitsimutse
content:
# 27 - M’titsitsimutse 

 1. Tiyamika’Nu Mulungu wokonda,Chifukwa cha Yesu Mwana wanuyo. CHORUS:Haleluya, tidzamtama, Haleluya, Amen;Haleluya timpembedza, Mulungu wathu.2. Tiyamikira, Mulungu wamphamvu;Chifukwa cha Mzimu wanu Woyera.3. Tiyamikira, Mwana wa Nkhosayo,Yemwe anafera zoipa zathu.4. Tiyamika’Nu, Mlungu wa chisomo,Munatigula ndi mwazi wanuwo.5 M’titsitsimutse, Ndi chikondi chanu,M’tiyatse ndi moto wa Mzimu wanu.

title: 28 - Khalatu Woyera
content:
# 28 - Khalatu Woyera

 1. Khalatu woyera, Pemphera mseri;Werenga mau ’ke, Masiku onse;Thangatani omwe Ali ofo’ka,Madalitso ake Funafunani.2. Khalatu woyera, Dziko laipa;Pemphera kolimba, Kwa Yesu Mbuye;Yang’anitsa Yesu, Ndi KumtsatiraKuti anthu ena Aone Yesu.3. Khalatu woyera, Akutsogoze,Usamtsogolere, M’njira zakozo;M’nsoni ndi pokondwa, Tsata MbuyakoKhulupira Yesu Ndi mau ake.4. Khalatu woyera, Khala wofatsa,Alamulire ’Ye, Ganizo lako;Utatsogozedwa Ndi Mzimu wake,Msanga udzagwira Ntchito ya mmwamba.

title: 29 - Mukhale Ndine
content:
# 29 - Mukhale Ndine 

 1. Mukhale ndine dzuwa lalowa, Wagwa usiku bwenzi lisowa,Ndilibe wina wondithandiza, Wa mphamvu ndinu, mkhale ndinetu.2. Kamoyo kanga katha leroli, Zidzachokanso zinthu za dziko,Zimasinthika zoonekazo, Simusinthika mkhale ndinetu.3. Koma kale mnakhalitsa pano, Mukhale ndine musachokenso,Simpempha kuti Mbuye mutsotse, Komatu mukhalitse ndinetu.4. Ndifuna inu tsiku lonselo, Ndi mphamvu yanu ndidzasungika,Mukatsogola sindiopai, Msana, usiku, mkhale ndinetu.5. Adani sindiopa mulipo, Muletse tsoka ndi chisonichi,Ikadza imfa ndzalimba mtima, M’imfa ndi moyo mkhale ndinetu.

title: 30 - Dzuwa Lili Kulowa
content:
# 30 - Dzuwa Lili Kulowa

 1. Dzuwa lili kulowa, Mlungu atipumitse;Linda ndi kupemphera mmene nyali zili kuwala m’mwamba.CHORUS:Woyera Ambuye wa makamu!Za m’mwamba ndi za dziko zitamanda Inu,Mlungu Wamkulu.2. Ambuye wamoyo’Nu, Ife tasonkhanatu,Kufuna nkhope Yanu; mutifungatire’fe m’khola Lanu3. Pamene mthunzi ugwa, Mumatifungatira;Mwa chisomo chanutu, Mitima yathu ikwera kwa Inu.4. Tikamwalira ife osaona za dziko,Ambuye wachifundo, mutidzutsenso tsiku lotsiriza.

title: 31 - Mombolo Wanga, Dzuwatu.
content:
# 31 - Mombolo Wanga, Dzuwatu

 1. Mombolo wanga, dzuwatu,La mtima wanga ndinudi, Palibe mdima ngatituMukawalira inedi.2. Muchotse zonse zoti bii,Zobisa nkhope yanuyo;Mudzadzetu mtimangawo,Ndi kuunika kwanuko.3. Madzulo ano mkhaletu,Pafupi ndine YesudiNdisanagone tuloto,Ndilingalira Inudi.4. Kapena wina leroli,Wasocherera m’njirayi,Ya Inu, Mbuye, mbwezetu,Mumpulumutse iyedi.

title: 32 - Ndiye Pothawira Pathu
content:
# 32 - Ndiye Pothawira Pathu 

 1. Mbuye ali thanthwe lathu, Ndiye pothawira pathu;Atipulumutsa m’zonse, Ndiye pothawira pathu.CHORUS:Ndiyetu thanthwe lilomba, Ndi mthuzi nthawi yotentha;Mtsogozi wa aulendo, Ndiye pothawira pathu.2. Pa nthawi ya usikuwo, Ndiye pothawira pathu;Palibe wotiopsa’fe, Ndiye pothawira pathu.3. Nkana chigumula chidze, Ndiye pothawira pathu;Mwa Mlungu tipeza bwino, Ndiye pothawira pathu.4. Inu thanthwe lokondedwa, Ndinu pothawira pathu;Khalani mthangati wathu, Ndinu pothawira pathu.

title: 33 - Mulungu Atsogoza ’Ne
content:
# 33 - Mulungu Atsogoza ’Ne 

 1. Mulungu atsogoza ’ne, Ndapuma m’mtima mwangamo.Ayang’anira m’njiramo, Poyenda ine konseko.CHORUS:Mulungu atsogoza ’ne, Ndi dzanja-dzanja lakelo.Ndidzamtsatira Mbuyanga, Poyenda ine konseko.2. Masiku ena mdima bi, Ndimavutika m’mtimamo.Pa nthawi zina nkondwadi, Popeza zokondwetsazo.3. Ndzagwira dzanja lanulo, Osang’ung’udza konseyi,Ndidzanka mokondweratu, Pomtsata Mbuye wangayo.4. Podzatha ntchito yangayi, Podzagonjetsa tchimolo,Kumene ndidzakhalatu, Sindidzaopa imfayo.

title: 34 - Pokhala Mtendere
content:
# 34 - Pokhala Mtendere 

 1. Pokhala mtendere mu mtimangamu, Pamene ndisaukanso,Pamene mabvuto ndi akurudi, Moyo wangawu ngwabwinotu.CHORUS:Moyowu (Moyowu) uli phee (uli phee). Moyo wangawu ngwabwinotu.2. Ngakhale Satana atizunza ’fe, Chiripo chitonthozocho;Chifundo cha Kristu anafera ’fe, Kundipatsa ’ne moyo wake.3. Uchimo unapachikidwa pomwe, Pa mtanda wa Yesu Mbuye,Machimo angawo anatherapo, Mbuye wanga ndiyamika ’Nu.4. Ambuyathu tikhumba tsiku lija, Limene tidzaona ’Nu,Lipenga limveke, tidzakondwatu, Pakukomana ndi Yesuyo.

title: 35 - Chidzakhala Chimwemwe
content: # 35 - Chidzakhala Chimwemwe

title: 36 - Ndikhulupira ’Nu
content:
# 36 - Ndikhulupira ’Nu

 1. Ndikhulupira ’Nu, Mwana wa Mlunguyo,Mbuyanga ’Nu;Mumve popempha ’ne, Tchimo muchotsebe,Lero ndikhale ’ne, Wa Inuyo.2. Mzimu mndipatseko, WondilimbitsayoMu mtimamo;Munandiferadi, Ndiyambe leroli,Inu kukonda ndi Mtimangawo.3. Poyenda m’mdima bii, M’mtimamo nsonizi,Mndigwiretu;Mdima uchoke zi, Msozi ulekedi,Ndisasochereyi, Kwa Inuko.

title: 37 - Ndidze Pafupipa
content:
# 37 - Ndidze Pafupipa

 1. Ndidze pafupipa Mlungu wanga,’Ngakhale ndi tsoka Mundibweza,Koma ndiyimbabe, Mbuye m’ndikhalitseMbuye m’ndikhalitse, M’fupi Ndinu.2. Ngakhale ku thengo, Ndasochera,M’mdima ndigonapo, E pa mwala.Koma m’kulotako, Ndiyandikizanso.Ndiyandikizanso, M’fupi Ndinu.3. Pajapo ndipenya Pokwerapo,Angelo atsika Kumwambako,Ndiwo akodola Kuti ndibwerere,Kuti ndibwerere, M’fupi Ndinu.4. Tsono poukanso Wokondwatu,Ndipeza pomwepo Pali Mlungu;Ndipo masautso Andisendezanso,Andisendezanso, M’fupi Ndinu.5. Podzabwera Iye N’dzanka naye,Dzuwa ndi nyenyezi Zitsalira;Pomwe ndiyimbanso, Ndidza pafupipo,Ndidza pafupipo, Mlungu wanga.

title: 38 - Limbikani Mwa Mulungu
content:
#  38 - Limbikani Mwa Mulungu 

 1 Limbikani mwa Mlungu wanuyo, Nkana m’dziko muli mavutowo;Khristu ndiye thanthwe lolimbalo, Ndi la mphamvu zonsezo.CHORUS: Tilimbike kuima pa thanthwe lija, Thanthwe ndilo Khristuyo; Ngati tipiriratu tidzankako, Kuli mpando wa Mlunguyo. 2 Limbikani ndi mtima woti nji, Inde mwa chikhulupirirocho; Kristu ndiye thanthwe la mphamvulo, Agonjetsa tchimolo. 3 Limbikani mwa choonadicho, Chikuthangatani koposatu; Kristu ndiye thanthwe lopumamo, Mmene vuto latha phe.

title: 39 - Thanthwe Lolimba
content:
# 39 - Thanthwe Lolimba 

 1. Chiyembekezo changatu, Chili mwa Yesu WoyeraSindikhulupira wina Koma dzina la Yesuyo.4. Pamene Iye adzadza, Ndidzapezeke mwa Iye,Ndiri m’chilungamo chake, Wopanda naye chifukwa.

title: 40 - Poyenda Ndi Mbuye
content:
# 40 - Poyenda Ndi Mbuye 

 1. Poyenda ndi Mbuye, mkuwala kwakeko, Aunikira m’njira mwathu;Pakugwira ntchito amakhala nafe, Ndi onse amene amvera.CHORUS:Khulupira, palibenso njira, Yakukondwa mwa Yesu,Komatu kumvera.2. Mthunzi sungagwetu, pena mtambo mmwamba, Komatu azipirikitsa;Nkhawa ndi chisoni zidzachoka ngati, Tikhulupira ndi kumvera.3. Chifukwa cha ntchito ndi zisoni zathu, Adzatilipira mokwana;Kopandanso imfa, kapena kukwiya, Tidzadalitsika pomvera.4. Sitingadziwetu zachikondi chake, Mpaka titadziperekatu;Chifukwa chifundo ndi chimwemwe chake, Amapatsa anthu omvera.5. Pompo m’chiyanjano tidzakhala naye, Kapena kuyenda ndi Iye;Ndipo tidzachita chifuniro chake, Tidzakhala omvera ndithu.

title: 41 - Mulungu Akhala Ndi Inu
content:
# 41 - Mulungu Akhale Ndi Inu 

 1. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Mpaka tidzaonananso;Atsogoze, asunge ’nu; Mulungu akhale ndi inu.CHORUS:Asunga nonsenu, Tikomana ndi Yesu,Asunga nonsenu, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.2. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi mapiko akubisa,Masiku onse kudyetsa; Mulungu akhale ndi inu.3. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi pamene muvutika,Adzakuthangatani ’nu, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.4. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, Ndi chikondi chake chonse,Asunge mzoopsya zonse, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

title: 42 - Sitidzalekananso
content:
# 42 - Sitidzalekananso

 1. Tikakhala ndi abwenzitu, M’dziko lathu lino,Posachedwa timalekana Nao mwa chisoni.CHORUS:Sitidzalekana m’mwamba, Sitidzalekana,M’dziko lokometsetsalo, Sitidzalekana.2. Timakhala ndi ch’yembekezo, Pakufa anzathu,Kuti pakutha dziko lino, Tidzakhala nao.3. Sitidzalekananso ai, M’dziko lokomalo,Nyimbo za chimwemwe, mtendere, ’Dzayimba kosatha.

title: 43 - Wogona Mwa Ambuye
content:
# 43 - Wogona Mwa Ambuye 

 1. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,  Podzuka sadzaliranso.  Mpumulo wa mtenderetu,  Wosaletseka ndi mdani.2. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,  Wopanda mantha ndi ’mfayo  Chodala ch’yembekezocho,  Cha moyo wa kumwambako3. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,  Akhala mu mtenderewo;  Chisoni chonse chatha phe!  Pobwera ’Ye adzauka.4. Wogona mwa Ambuyeyo,  Adzamvatu lipengalo;  Adzadzutsidwa mmandamo!  Kupita kwa Ambuyeyo.

title: 44 - Ndidzamdziwa Mombolo Wanga
content:
# 44 - Ndidzamdziwa Mombolo Wanga 

 1. Pamene nditatha zintchito zanga zonsezo,Nditaoloka pa tsidya la nyanja;Chakufachi chikadzavalatu chosafanso;Pompo ndidzamdziwa Mombolo wanga.CHORUS:Ndidzamdziwa, Ndidzamdziwa, Podzaima pa mbali pakepo,Ndidzamdziwa, ndidzamdziwa, Ndi misomali m’manja mwake.2. Moyo wanga udzakondwera pakumuona,Ndi kuona nkhope yake yowala;Ndidzamyamika Iye ndi mtima wanga wonse,Malo adandikonzera kumwamba.3. Ee! ndidzakondwa pakuona okondedwawoOmwe ndalekana nawo m’dzikoli;Koma n’dzayamba ndaonana naye Yesuyo,Wokondedwa wanga wopambanayo.4. Kupyolera pa zipata kunka ku mzindawo,Iye adzanditsogolera ine,Nyimbo ya nthawi zonse ndidzayimba mokondwa;Nditamuona Mpulumutsi wanga.

title: 45 - Patseni Bible
content:
# 45 - Patseni Bible 

 1. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Ndi chotitsogolera njirayo;Monga mapiri oonetsa kwathu, Obweza anthu osocherawo.CHORUS:Patseni Bible ndilo mau ake, Mau oyera a Mulunguyo,Ndilo pangano la chikondi chake, ndi nyali mnjira yonka m’mwambamo.2. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Mmene usweka mtima wangawo;Patseni mau a Ambuye Yesu, Mau okondweretsa mmtimanga.3. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Nyali ya kusonyeza njirayo,Mmene ndingagwe lindipulumutsa, Lindisonyeza tchimo langalo.4. Patseni Bible ndilo ndikufuna, Liunikira a mu mdimawo,Ndilo chiyembekezo kwa olira, Ndi nyali m’njira yonka m’mwambamo.

title: 46 - Yimbiranso Kwa Ine
content:
# 46 - Yimbiranso Kwa Ine

 1. Yimbiranso kwa inetu, Mau a Moyowo;Ndionenso za iwotu, Mau a moyowo.Mau abwinowo, Andiphunzitsatu,CHORUS:Mau ake, ozizwitsa, Mau a moyowo,Mau ake, abwinowo, Mau a moyowo.2. Khristu apatsa onsewo, Mau a moyowo;Wochimwa ’we akwitana, Mau a moyowo.Angoperekatu kuti tinke mmwamba,3. Uitana uthengawo, Mau a moyowo;Adzakhululukira ’we, Mau a moyowo.Yesu Mpulumitsi Ayeretsa iwe,

title: 47 - Ndaimirira pa Gombe
content:
# 47 - Ndaimirira pa Gombe

 1. Ndaimirira pa gombe, Ndiyang’anitsitsa,Ku Kanani wabwinoyo, Komwe ndidzalowa.CHORUS:Tidzapumula mdziko lokondwa (lokondwa),Kuoloka pa gombe lija (lowala),Tidzayimba nyimbo ya Mose,Ndikukhala ndi Yesu nthawi zonse.2. Pa madambo akuluwo, ’Dzawala tsikulo,Khristu adzalamulira, Nadzachotsa mdima.3. Ndidzafika uko liti, Ndikudalitsidwa,N’dzamona liti Atate, Kuti ndikapume?4. Moyo wanga ukondwera, Kusiya dzikoli;Nkana namondwe aombe, Sindiopa konse.

title: 48 - Chimwemwe Posachedwa
content:
# 48 - Chimwemwe Posachedwa

 1. Chimwemwe podzatha ntchitoyi, Podzasonkhana okunkha,Alikudza ndi zipatso, Ku Yerusalemuko.CHORUS:Kudzakhala chimwemwedi,Chimwemwe cha nthawi zonse,Chifukwa nthawi yafika,Yosonkhana okunkha.Bass ndi Tenor:Chimwemwe posachedwa,Chimwemwe cha muyaya,Chifukwa nthawi yafika, Yosonkhana okunkha.2. Tidzayimba nyimbo zabwino, Tidzayamika mokondwa,Tidzatama Khristu Mfumu, Mu mzinda watsopano.3. Chimwemwe chitidikirako, Ku malo a chikhuduwo;Yesu ali kuwakonza, Mu Mzinda watsopano.

title: 49 - Ganizo Lokoma
content:
# 49 - Ganizo Lokoma

 1. Ganizo lokoma, Limadza m’mtimamu;Ndili pafupi ndi kwathu, Koposa kalelo.CHORUS:Pafupitu, Ndi kwathuko;Ndili pafupi ndi kwathu, Koposa kalelo.2. Kufupi ndi Tate, Komwe kuli malo;Ku mpando wa Yesu Mbuye Ku nyanja yoyera.3. Ndili kupitatu, Nditula katundu;Ndisiya mtanda wangawo, Kuvala korona.

title: 50 - Bwinoli Tipita
content:
# 50 - Bwinoli Tipita

 1. Kuli dziko labwino m’mwambaLakuwala koposa dzuwa,Ndi Atate akonza malo,Pokhalira ife komweko.CHORUS:Bwinoli tipita,Tikomana ku dziko lija (lijalo).2. Tidzayimba komweko nyimbo,Za abwino omvera Yesu,Sitidzamvatu zisoninso,Tidzakondwa masiku onse.3. Tidzatama Atate wathu,Kuti iye ’napatsa Yesu,Kuchotsera zochimwa zonse,Ndi kutidalitsira ife.

title: 51 - Mutibatizenso
content:
# 51 - Mutibatizenso 

  1. Mutibatize ndi mphamvu yanu, Mutitsitsimutse mwa nsoni zanu.CHORUS: Tikupemphani Mbuye wathu Yesu, Mutibatizetu ndi mzimu wanu.    2. Osayenera ndi ochimwa’fe  Mutitsuke ife m’zoipa zathu.     3. Tifuna nkhunda ya m’mwamba idze  Idzatidalitse mwa nsoni zanu. 4. Imvani mau ochoka m’mwamba, Ndiwe mwana wanga wokondedwayo.  CHORUS (wotsiriza): Tigwadira Inu Mwana wa nkhosa, Tikupembedzani kosatha, Amen.

title: 52 - Kasupe Wa Madalitso
content:
# 52 - Kasupe Wa Madalitso

 1. Idzani ndi madalitso, Mtima wanga uyimbe;Nsisi zanu zisaleke, Kuti tiyamike ’Nu,Phunzitseni kumvera ’Nu, Kuti ndikudziweni,Pamene chiyembekezo Chidzaza mtima wanga.2. Ndinutu thandizo langa, Mwandifikitsa pano,Ndipo mwa chifundo chanu Ndikafika kwathuko.Anandifuna Yesuyo, Posochera mtalimo;Anakhetsa mwazi wake Kundiombola ine.3. M’ndipatse chisomo chanu, Pakuti ndichisowa!Mundikokere kwa Inu Ndi chikondi chanucho.Sindifuna kusochera, Kukusiyani Inu,Tengani Mtima wangawu; Ukhale wanu konse

title: 53 - Mzimu Ndi Mtsogoziyo
content:
# 53 - Mzimu Ndi Mtsogoziyo 

      1. Mzimu ndi mtsogoziyo M’njira ya Chikhristuyo, Mtitsogoze ndinutu, Pa ulendo wathuwu. Miyoyo ikondweratu, Pomva mau akewo; Pakunena Mzimuyo, “Osochera, bwerani.”    2. Bwenzi lathu ndinutu, Mkhale mfupi nafetu, Msatisiye tokhafe, Pakuyenda m’mdimamu. Pakuomba mphepozo, Timaopa m’mtimamo Tsono timva mauwo, “Osochera, bwerani.”    3. Mnene nchito yathatu, Mmene tidikira ’Nu, Pakukhumba m’mwambamo, Tsono tipempherabe. Nthawi ya mavutowo Tikhulupirira ’Nu, Tsono timva mauwo, “Osochera, bwerani.”

title: 54 - Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga
content:
# 54 - Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga

     1. Ndifuna Inu, Mbuyanga, Chifukwa ndagwa mthopemo, Ndi madzi pena motowo, M’nditsuke ’ne, mnditsuke ’ne. CHORUS: Mnditsuke ’ne mu mtimamo, Ndi madzi pena motowo. Mnditsuke ’ne machimowo, Achoketu mu mtimanga.    2. Mukatsegula masowa, Ndidzakuyamikani ’Nu. Komabe Mtima woyera, Udzapambana zonsezo.    3. Ukatsukidwa mtimawo Adzatseguka masowo. Chifukwa kuti mwa Inu, Ndionamo za mmwambamo.    4. Ndayesa kudzikonzatu, Kuchotsa tchimo langalo Ngakhale ndayesetsatu, Zoipazo zilipobe.

title: 55 - Kodi Mwalandira Yesu?
content:
# 55 - Kodi Mwalandira Yesu?

     1. Kodi mwalandira Yesu Mbuyeyo? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake? Mwakhulupirira mwa chisomo ’ke? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake? CHORUS: Kodi mwasambamo, Mmwazi wabwino wa Yesuyo? Kodi mwayeretsa mtima wanuwo? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?    2. Kodi mukuyenda ndi Ambuyeyo? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake? Mwapumula mwa Wopachikidwayo? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?    3. Kodi mwakonzeka pa kubwera ’Ye? Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake? Kuti mukalowe m’malo abwino, Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?    4. Tayanitu zakunyansa zanuzo, Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake? Wakuchotsa tchimo lanu lonselo, Kodi mwasamba mmwazi wake?

title: 56 - Ambuye, Ndiri Kudza
content:
# 56 - Ambuye, Ndiri Kudza 

     1. Ndasocherera kutali, Mbuye ndibwera; Ndayenda m’njira za mdima; Mbuye ndibwera.   2. Ndamwaza zaka zambiri, Mbuye ndibwera. Ndilapa ndithu machimo, Mbuye ndibwera.   3. Ndatopa nazo zoipa, Mbuye ndibwera. Ndimvera mau anuwo, Mbuye ndibwera.   4. Mtima wanga uwawadi, Mbuye ndibwera, Mundichiritsa Mbuy’anga; Mbuye ndibwera.   5. Ndisowa mwazi  wanuwo, Mbuye ndibwera; Munditsuke ndiyere mbu, Mbuye ndibwera

title: 57 - Yemwe Afuna
content:
# 57 - Yemwe Afuna

    1. Yemwe alikumva! fuula mau: Tumizani mthenga m’dziko monsemo; Lalikani anthu kuli konseko; Yemwe afuna adze. CHORUS: Omwe afuna, omwe afuna Uza za chimwemwe m’dambo ndi m’phiri; Atate wokonda aitana’ke Omwe afuna adze.   2. Yemwe alikudza, asachedwe, Pakhomo patseguka, lowa msanga; Yesu ndiye njiratu yakuona Yemwe afuna adze.   3. Yemwe afunitsa za mtendere, Yemwe afunitsa adzakhalabe; Yemwe afunitsa moyo wosatha: Yemwe afuna adze.

title: 58 - Mumbveke Mbuyeyo
content:
# 58 - Mumbveke Mbuyeyo

    1. Tamani mphamvu ya Yesu angelo agwade; Tulutsanitu korona mumveke Mbuyeyo Tulutsanitu korona mumveko Mbuyeyo.   2. Inu osankhidwa ake, Owomboledwa’nu, Tamani Mpulumutsiyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo; Tamani Mpulumutsiyo mumveko Mbuyeyo.   3. Anthu onse ndi mitundu, Pa dziko linotu, Am’lemekeze Mfumuyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo; Am’lemekeze Mfumuyo, mumveke Mbuyeyo.   4. Tifuna kuti komweko, Tikamgwadire’Ye Tidzayimba kosaleka mumveke Mbuyeyo Tidzayimba kosaleka mumveke Mbuyeyo.

title: 59 - Yesu Bwenzi Mtimanga
content:
# 59 - Yesu Bwenzi Mtimanga 

    1. Yesu, Bwenzi Mtimanga, Ndithawira kwanuko. Pakuuka madziwo, Pakuomba mphepoyo. Mundibise Mbuyanga, Likaleka vutolo, Mnditsogoze bwinotu, Mndilandire kwanuko.   2. Pobisala penai, Ndingokangamira ’Nu. Ndiri wosauka ’ne, Mbuye, msandisiyedi. Wondithandiza wanga ’Nu, Ndikukhulupira ’Nu, Mu mapiko anuwo Mundifunde inedi.   3. Khristu, Mukwaniradi, Mndikhutitse mmtimanga; Msangalatse ifetu, Ovutika tonsefe. Ine ndi woipadi! Inu wakuyera mbu; Ine ndi wonyengadi, Woonadi Inutu.   4. Nsoni zanu ziinga Zakuipa zangazo. Mundisunge woti mbe, Ee! ndi mwazi wanuwo. Pa chitsime chanucho Mundimwetse Inudi; Mtima wanga madziwo Adzayendayendabe.

title: 60 - Yesu Chimwemwe Chathu
content:
# 60 - Yesu Chimwemwe Chathu 

    1. Yesu chimwemwe chathucho, Chitsime ndinu cha moyo. Ku’nika kwa ’nthu onsewo, Tibwera kwanu Mbuyathu.   2. Polawa mkate wa moyo Tilakalaka kudyanso. Pakumwa madzi a moyo Tikwanitsidwa ndi Inu.   3. Mtima ufuna Inuyo Kumene mtitumizako Tidzakondwera ngatitu Tigwira Inu kolimba.   4. Yesu, mukhale nafetu; Musangalatse ifenso. Muchotse mdima wa tchimo, Muwale mdziko lonseli.

title: 61 - Inde Ndifuna Kumvatu
content:
# 61 - Inde Ndifuna Kumvatu 

    1. Inde ndifuna kumvatu, Za chikondano chakecho, Cha Yesu Mbuye wangayo, Zomwe anamva kalelo. CHORUS: E! Zina za Yesu, E! zina za Yesu, Inde, ndilira mmtimamo, Chipulumutso chakecho.   2. Zina za Yesu ndimvetu Kuti ndichite zakezo. Mzimu Woyera mudzetu, Ndiphunzitseni zonsezo.   3. Yesu ndi mmau mwakemo, Inde ndicheza nayeyo, Liu ndimamva mbukhumo, Ndilo la Yesu Mbuyeyo.   4. Zina za Yesu mmwambamo, Ali pa mpando pakepo, Udze Ufumu wakewo, Ndiyetu Mfumu ponsepo.

title: 62 - Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu
content:
# 62 - Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu 

    1. Ambuyanga Yesu, Ndikonda Inu, Ndisiya zoipa chifukwa chanu; Ambuye wabwino ndi Mplumutsiyo; Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.   2. Ndikonda chifukwa munakonda ’ne; Mnafera pa mtengo kuombola ’ne; Mukhululukira zoipa zonse; Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.   3. Ndidzakukondani kosalekai, Ndidzakutamani masiku onse. Mpakatu ndidzafa ndidzanenabe, Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.   4. Ku malo owalo kumwamba komwe Ndidzakuongani, Ambuye Yesu; Ntavala korona ndizayimbabe, Ndikonda tsopano koposa kale.

title: 63 - Ndingayere Bwanji ’Ne?
content:
# 63 - Ndingayere Bwanji ’Ne?

    1. Ndingayere bwanji ’ne? Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu. Nch’ani chindichizanso? Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu. CHORUS: Mtsinje wa mwaziwo, Undiyeretsanso; Sin’dziwa winanso, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo.2. Pakudetswa ndiona, Mwazi wa Ambuye yesu. Pakuchimwa nditchula, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu3. Zina sizikwanatu, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo. Ntchito zanga zichepa, Mwazi wa Ambuye ndiwo.4. Ndimakhulupiradi, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu. Zolungama zangazi, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.5. Poyamika ndiyimba Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu. Ndithokoza Mbuyanga, Mwazi wa Ambuye Yesu.

title: 64 - Kodi Walemedwa M’mtima Mwako?
content:
# 64 - Kodi Walemedwa M’mtima Mwako? 

    1. Kodi walemedwa m’mtima mwako?Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu Kodi uli kumva za chisoni? Nena kwa Yesu yekha. CHORUS: Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu,Ndi bwenzi labwinotu. Ndiye bwenzi lopambana onse,Nena kwa Yesu yekha.   2. Kodi ukulira mwa chisoni?Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu; Kodi tchimo lina labisika?Nena kwa Yesu yekha.   3. Kodi umaopa za chisoni?Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu; Kodi ulikuda nkhawa m’mtima?Nena kwa Yesu yekha.   4. Kodi ukulingalira imfa?Nena kwa Yesu, nena kwa Yesu; Kodi ukulira kuti adze?Nena kwa Yesu yekha.

title: 65 - N’kwabwino Kukhulupirira
content:
# 65 - N’kwabwino Kukhulupirira

    1. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, M’mau ake a Yesu; Kupuma m’malonjezo’ke, Ndimtama nthawi zonse. CHORUS: Ndikhulupirira Yesu, Ndimtama nthawi zonse; Yesu ali wa chifundo, Ndimtama nthawi zonse.2. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, Mwazi wake wa Yesu; Kungomkhulupira Iye Adzatitsuka ife.3. N’kwabwino kukhulupira, Kuti achotse tchimo; Nadzatipatsa’fe moyo, Chimwemwe ndi mtendere.4. Ndikondwa kumdziwa Iye, Mpulumutsi wangayo; N’dziwa adzakhala nane, Mpaka chimaliziro.

title: 66 - Poyambapo Ndakondwadi
content:
# 66 - Poyambapo Ndakondwadi

    1. Poyambapo ndakondwadi, Ntapeza Inu Mbuyetu, Ndiyimba nyimbo yomweyi, Kukondwa sindikhala du. CHORUS: Kalelo! Kalelo! Wandisambitsa mmtimamo; Wandiweruza lomwelo, Kupemba ndi kukondwako. Kalelo! Kalelo! Wandisambitsa mmtimamo.2. Ndamuza ndimakhalatu Ku nyumba kwake komweko; Mnyamata wake ndinetu, Ndampatsa Mtima wonsewo.3. Omwewo mapanganowo, Sitilekana ifetu. Ndamvera ine mauwo, Wandiloleza m’mtimamo.4. Ndampatsa mtima wonsewo, Kupuma mwa Ambuyeyo: Ndikhala, osamlekai, Kuthawa ndi kumsiya ’Ye.

title: 67 - Idzani Nonsenu Okonda Yesu
content:
# 67 - Idzani Nonsenu Okonda Yesu

    1. Idzani nonsenu, Okonda Yesuyo, Tiyimbe nyimbo yabwino, Tiyimbe nyimbo yabwino Ku mpando wakewo, Ku mpando wakewo. CHORUS: Tiyende (tu) pamodzi, Tilikupita kumwamba; Akhristu tilikupita (pita), ku Ziyoni wabwinoyo.2. Ngakhale enawo Aleke kwimbako, Akhristu ’fe tidzayimba, Akhristu ’fe tidzayimba  Kumlemekeza ’Ye, Kumlemekeza ’Ye.3. Akhristu tonsefe, Tikondwe mdzikoli, Koposa anthu enawo, Koposa anthu enawo,  Tisanafikeko, Tisanafikeko.4. Tiyimbe mokondwa, Misozi iume; Poyenda kunka kwathuko, Poyenda kunka kwathuko, Kwa Mlungu wathuyo, Kwa Mlungu wathuyo.

title: 68 - Ndikonda Kunena Ndaomboledwa
content:
# 68 - Ndikonda Kunena Ndaomboledwa

    1. Ndikonda kunena chifukwa, Ndaomboledwa ndi mwazi! Ndaomboledwa mwa chifundo, Ndine wake nthawi zonse. CHORUS: Ndi mwazitu (ndi mwazitu) wa Yesu, ndaomboledwa; Ndine wake (ndine wake) kosatha, ndaomboledwa.   2. Ndinetu wokondwa mwa Yesu, Kukondwa kosaneneka; Ndziwa kuti kuwala kwake Kumakhalabe ndi ine.   3. Ndisinkha za Mombolo wanga, Tsiku lonse ndisinkha ’Ye, Ndiyimba wosakhala chete, Ndiyimba chikondi chake.   4. Ndidziwa kuti ndzamuona, Mfumu amene ndimkonda; Yemwe amanditsogolera, Ndi kundisunga usiku.5. Korona ali kudikira, Mmalo anga owalawo; Msanga ndi oyera mtimawo Ndidzakhala ndi Ambuye.

title: 69 - Tidzakhalitsa Pa Kasupe
content:
# 69 - Tidzakhalitsa Pa Kasupe

    1. Tidzakhalitsa pa kasupe, Wa madzi akewo. Kumene Yesu adikira, Kupatsa moyowo. CHORUS: Tidzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu), ’Dzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu), ’Dzakhalitsa pa kasupe (wathu). Pali madzi a moyo.   2. Tikatopatu ndi ulendo, Tidzapumulatu, Pa mtsinje wopambana yonse, Wokondwakondwatu.   3. Idzani nonsenu kwa Khristu, Mudzamwe madziwo, Adzatimwetsa kwa ulere, Kasupe wakeyo.

title: 70 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?
content:
# 70 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?

    1. Mmene Yesu adzasonkhatu, Mitundu yonse ya dziko, Kodi tidzaima bwanji’fe Pa mpando wachiweruzo? CHORUS: Adzasonkhanitsa tiriguyo, Koma mankhusu adzataya; Nanga tidzaima bwanji ko’ Pa tsiku la chiweruzo?   2. Kodi tidzamva mau ake, Wachita bwino iwetu, Kapena tidzanjenjemera, Tidzachotsedwa ku mpando?   3. Iye adzakondwera ndithu, Kuona owomboledwa, Adzawabvekatu zobvala, Pa kugwadira Mbuyeyo.   4. Tiyeni tidikire tsono, Ndi nyali zathu zowala, Poitana Mkwati ku phwando Tidzakhale okonzeka.   5. Tikakhala okonzekatu, Tikakhala opirira; Podzatha ulendo wathuwu, Tidzanka naye kumwamba.

title: 71 - Kodi Dzina Langa Lalembedwamo?
content:
# 71 - Kodi Dzina Langa Lalembedwamo?

    1. Mbuye sindisamala kukhala wachuma; Ndifuna kukalowa m’dziko la kumwamba; M’bukhu lokometsetsa la ufumu wanu, Kodi lalembedwamo Mbuye dzina langa. CHORUS: Kodi dzina langa, Lalembedwa m’mwamba? M’bukhu la ufumuwo, Kodi lalembedwa?   2. Machimo anga alipo ambiri-mbiri, Koma mwazi wa Mpulumutsi wandikwana; Chifukwa lonjezano lanu lilipobe, Ngakhale afiire, ndidzawayeretsa.   3. Ku mzinda wokoma wa malo owala’wo  Ndi anthu ovala za ulemelerozo;  Kumene choipa sichidzaonongako, Kodi dzina langali lilipo m’bukhumo?

title: 72 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo?
content:
# 72 - Tidzaima Bwanji Pa Chiweruzo? 

    1. Chiweruziro ndithu chayambidwa, Mabukhu atsegulidwa; Ndipo ntchito iri yonseyo M’lungu adzaweruza. CHORUS: Kodi ife tidzatani Pa tsiku lalikululo? Kodi tidzafika kwa Iye machimo atatsukidwa?   2. Ayamba kuweruza akufa, Msanga aweruza a moyo, Mwa zolembedwa m’mabukhu, Adzaweruza onsewo.   3. Kodi tidzatani pa nthawiyo, Povumbulutsidwa machimo! Podzaweruzidwa mlandu, Kodi tidzaloledwatu?

title: 73 - Pobwera Mfumu
content:
# 73 - Pobwera Mfumu 

    1. Taitanidwatu ku phwando, Kukhala nao anthu ake; Chidzaonekanji kwa ife, Pobwera Mfumu? CHORUS: Pobwera Mfumu, mbale, Pobwera Mfumu! Chidzaonekanji kodi, Pobwera Mfumu?   2. Adzavala korona Iye, Amene anafera anthu; Tidzamuona bwino-bwino, Pobwera Mfumu.   3. Monga kung’anima kwa mphezi, Zobisika zidzaoneka Tidzadziwana wina mnzake, Pobwera Mfumu.   4. Adzaona anthu akewo, Atavalatu zoyerazo; Tikapirira tidzakondwa, Pobwera Mfumu.   5. Kulekana kwa nthawi zonse, Kulira kwa anthu ochimwa, Kudzakhala koopsa ndithu, Pobwera Khristu.6. Ambuye tilandirenitu, Tikhale pafupi nanutu, Kuti tisadzaope konse, Pobwera Inu.

title: 74 - M’mawa Tidzafesa
content:
# 74 - M’mawa Tidzafesa

    1. M’mawa tidzafesa mbeu zakukoma, Msana ndi usiku tidzafesanso, Nyengo ya masika tidzatema m’munda Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.CHORUS: Ndi zipatsozo, ndi zipatsozo Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.   2. Tidzifesa m’dzuwa tidzifesa m’thunzi, Sitiopa ife mtambo ndi mphepo. Athatu masika nchitozi zidzatha, Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.   3. Tingolira kaya koma tidzafesa Mbeu za Ambuye ntchito ya Yesu. Adzachotsa msozi adzatilandira, Tidzabwera tonse ndi zipatsozo.

title: 75 - A! Mbusa Wanga Ndimvatu
content:
# 75 - A! Mbusa Wanga Ndimvatu 

    1. A! Mbusa wanga ndimvatu, Uko ku chipululuko, Zilira nkhosa zaketu, Zili kutali mkholamo.CHORUS:Bwezatu, bwezatu, Bweza zonse moopsamo;Bwezatu, bwezatu, Bweza zakezo kwa Yesu.2. Ndani afuna kunkako, Kukazipeza nkhosazo? Ndani adzathandizayo, Kuti zifunde m’kholamo?3. Etu! zilira konseko, Zili ku phiri ko’psako, Imva, anena Mwiniyo, “Kweye, upeze Nkhosazo.”

title: 76 - Ndikonda Kuuzabe
content:
# 76 - Ndikonda Kuuzabe 

    1. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano ya Yesu, ndi  Zosaoneka zomwe, za m’mwamba zakezi; Ndikonda kuuzabe, za cikondi chake, Kubukitsa mbiriyo ya Mwana wa Mlungu. CHORUS: Ndikonda kuuzabe, za Yesu mwini wanga, Za chifundo chakecho, Ndiyimbe kumwamba.   2. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano yozizwitsa Chifukwa ipambana, zonse zina ndamva; Ndikonda kuuzabe, zomwe achitira Kwa ine ndi kwa onse, a m’mvera ndi mtima.   3. Ndikonda kuuzabe, nthano yokomayo Nthawi zonse ndiyimva, ndisekereranso. Ndifuna kuuzabe kumvetsa amene Sanamve za Mulungu, Wopulumutsayo.   4. Ndikonda kuuzabe, Mpulumutsi wanga Natsika kumwambako natifera dala Nakweranso kwawoko nadzadzanso Iye, Kusonkhanitsa ake, Naye kukhalabe.

title: 77 - Kufunafuna Otaikawo
content:
# 77 - Kufunafuna Otaikawo 

    1. Kufunatu E! ndi mtina wonse, Kufuna akusocherawo; Lalika kuti Yesu anati, Idzani nonse kwa Inetu. CHORUS: Pitanitu (inde) konse konseko, Mukabwere ndi (anthu) osochera; M’khola lake la (Yesu) Mpulumutsi. Nafera’Ye anthu (E) ochimwa.   2. Kufunatu ndi kutsogolera, Anthu ofoka’wo kwa Yesu; Kutsogolera njira yabwino, Yonka ku moyotu wosatha.   3. Tidzitero ponka kulalika, Kutsata Yesu tsiku n’tsiku; Ndi kuthangata ofoka onse, Kuwatsogolera kwa Yesu.

title: 78 - Kupulumutsa Omwe Ali Kufa
content:
# 78 - Kupulumutsa Omwe Ali Kufa 

    1. Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu, Uwachotse m’manda a uchimo; Lilira ochimwa, nuwadzutsetu, Nuwauze za Yesu Mbuyeyo. CHORUS: Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu, Yesu wachifundo alanditsa.   2. Ngakhale amkana, Iye alinda, Afuna kulandira olapa. Awapembedzera moona Mtima, Adzawakhululukira iwo.   3. Mu Mtima wa munthu muli zambiri, Koma Yesu azichotsa zonse; Atakhudzidwa ndi chikondi chake, Nsinga za Satana zidzaduka.   4. Pulumutsa omwe ali kufatu Limbitsa othodwa ndi olema; Kwabwezera m’njira yopapatiza, Ndi kuwauza za Mpulumutsi

title: 79 - Kufuna Antchito
content:
# 79 - Kufuna Antchito

    1. Mindatu yayera kale  Dzinthu dzonse dzachanso; Pafupi ndi kutaliko M’dziko lonse lapansi. CHORUS: Mbuye tikupempha Inu, Kokosani antchito; Atumizeni msangatu, Nthawi isanethe’i.   3. Atumizeni m’mawatu, Ndi nthawi ya usana; Ngakhale dzuwa lilowa, Agwirebe ntchitoyo.4. Ndipo inu otumidwa, Gwirani ntchitoyo; Ndipo potsiriza ntchito Mudzadza ndi chimwemwe.

title: 80 - Tinke Ife Ku Ntchito Ya Mulungu
content:
# 80 - Tinke Ife Ku Ntchito Ya Mulungu 

    1. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Ambuye; Tizitsata mapazi a Mbuye Yesu. Mau ake adzapatsa mphamvu yake, Ndipo ndi mtima wonse tigwire ntchito. CHORUS: Gwirani ntchitoyo, Gwirani ntchitoyo, Mpakatu Yesuyo, Adzabweranso mdzikoli.   2. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Mlungu wathu, Yakudyetsa, Kumwetsa osowa onse. Ndi mbendela ya mtanda tidzayendatu, Pakulalika chipulumutso chake.3. Tinke ife ku ntchito ya Mlungu wathu, Ntchito ya kuchenjeza ilipo lero; Ndi kwa anthu a mdima a mdziko lino, Ndi kukweza Ambuye Ndi Mfumu yathu.4. Tichitebe ntchito za Mlungu wathu, Posachedwa Ambuye adzabweranso; Ndipo ife tidzanka kumwamba naye, Nyimbo zathu zokoma tidzayimbabe.

title: 81 - Gwira Zinchito Zake
content:
# 81 - Gwira Zinchito Zake 

    1. Gwira zintchito zake, Mdima ukudzatu, Yamba mmamawa ndithu, Kuli kuchatu. Gwiranso msana monse, Mpaka madzulowo. Gwira, usiku udza, Posachedwatu.2. Gwira zintchito zake, Mdima ukudzatu, Gwira masana onse, Kusanadei. Udzapumula bwino, Potha zintchitozo, Gwira, usiku udza, posachedwatu.   3. Mkhristu gwiratu ntchito, Mdima ukudzatu, Dzuwa lapita kale, Msanga kuda bi! Gwira madzulodzulo, Usanagonetu, Msanga zintchito zonse Tere zithatu.

title: 82 - M’mawa
content:
# 82 - M’mawa 

    1. M’dzamva mau anga m’mawa Mbuye popemphera; Ndidzayang’ana kwa Inu M’mene ndipemphera.   2. Mzimu anditsogolere M’njira zolungama! Andisonyeze njira za  Ntchito zanga zonse.   3. Anthu okonda dzinalo Adzakwanitsidwa; Mulungu adzawaphimba Ndi chikopa chake.

title: 83 - Anthu Ambiri Ayimba
content:
# 83 - Anthu Ambiri Ayimba 

    1. Anthu ambiri ayimba, Lodala dzina la Mbuye!  Ulemelero kwa Mlungu, Lodala dzina la Mbuye. CHORUS: Dzina lodala, dzina lodala, dzina la Ambuye Yesu. Dzina lodala, dzina lodala, dzina la Ambuye Yesu.   2. Dzinali lichotsa mantha, Lodala dzina la Mbuye! Lili nyimbo ya ochimwa, Lodala dzina la Mbuye.   3. Athyola mphamvu ya tchimo, Lodala dzina la Mbuye! Mwazi wake utitsuka, Lodala dzina la Mbuye.

title: 84 - M’manja Mwake
content:
# 84 - M’manja Mwake

    1. M’manja mwakemo ndapulumutsidwa,  Ngakhale mavuto achuluka,  Ndikhulupirira ndikudalira,  Adzandisunga Wondiombola. CHORUS: M’manja mwake, m’manja mwake,  Adzandichotsamo ndani,  M’manja mwake ndidzakhalitsa,  Inde ku nthawi zosatha. 2. M’manja mwake chimwemwecho ndapeza,  Ndibisale ku mayeso onse,  Mofunda ndithu ndidzakhalitsamo,  M’manja a Yesu n’dzakhalitsane 3. M’manja mwake ndi populumukira,  M’mene uvutika mtima wanga,  M’mene abwenzi sangandithangate,  Ndidzapumulatu m’manja mwake.

title: 85 - Ndiyimba Mphamvu Ya Mulungu
content:
# 85 - Ndiyimba Mphamvu Ya Mulungu 

    1. Ndiyimba mphamvu ya Mlungu, wolenga mapiri, Yemwe anapanga zinyanja ndi mlengalenga; Ndiyimba nzeru imene inapanga dzuwa; Mwezi uwala usiku, ndi nyenyezi zomwe.   2. Ndiyimba ubwino wake, Wakupatsa kudya; Analenga zonse ndi mau, nayamikira. Mbuye munazikhazika mozizwitsa ndithu! Zinthu za m’dziko lapansi ndi zam’mbwamba zomwe.   3. Mbeu ndi maluwa omwe, zidziwitsa Inu; Mitambo yonse ndi namondwe, zimvera Inu. Za moyo zonse zimasamalidwa ndi Inu, Tilibe kothawira’ko, koma kwanu kokha.

title: 86 - Gwadwani Pa Maso Pa Mfumu
content:
# 86 - Gwadwani Pa Maso Pa Mfumu 

    1. Gwadani pa maso a Mfumuyo, Yimbani chikondi cha Mbuyeyo; Iyeyo n’chikopa, mtetezi wathu, Amene akhala kumwamba komwe.   2. Yimbani za mphamvu ya Mlunguyo, Ndi za nsisi zake kwa ifetu; Amakhala m’mphezi ndi m’bingu momwe, Ambuye avala zoyeratu mbu.   3. Chikondi chake ndi chakuyatu, Chimaonekera mu dzuwalo; M’mitsinje, m’mapiri, m’madambo momwe, Mu mvula, mu mame, ndi m’zina zonse.   4. Ndifetu opanda mphamvu konse, Tithemba pa Inu, Mbuyathuyo; Mwa nsisi za inu mtisunge ife; Mtetezi ndi Mlengi ndi Bwenzi lathu.

title: 87 - Tate Tikudza Kwa Inu.
content:
# 87 - Tate Tikudza Kwa Inu.

    1. Tate tikudzatu, Kwa inu, Mbuyathu, Ngaka yolimbayo, Tipempha ’fe; Dziko ndi la mdima Mmene mulibe ’Nu, Mtisangalatse ’fe, Tate wathu.CHORUS: Tate tibweratu kwa Inuko, ’Mvani popempha ’fe, Tate wathu.   2. Mtipulumutse ’fe Kwa mdani wathuyo, Mutithangate ’fe Mu vutoli; Ndife ofo’katu, Limbikitsani ’fe, Ndi mphamvu yanuyo, Tate wathu.   3. Tipempha nsisizo Kuti tikhaletu Mu njira yanuyo, Tate wathu. Mtsitsogolere ’fe Mpaka mudzabwera, Ndipo tidzapuma kwa inuko.

title: 88 - Msandipitirire Yesu
content:
# 88 - Msandipitirire Yesu 

    1. Msandipitirire Yesu, Ndikupemphani. Muli kudalitsa ena, Mndidalitse ’ne. CHORUS: Yesu, Mbuye, Mundimveretu. Mmene muitana ena, Msandilekatu.   2. Ndigwadira Inu, Yesu, Musandikane; Ndikalapatu machimo, Ndidzachita mwayi.   3. Nkhope yanu ndifunitsa, Sindiyenera; Mtima wanga muchiritsa, Nthenda zangazi.   4. Yesu ndinutu chitsime, Cha chimwemwecho; Sindifuna wina konse, Koma Inutu.

title: 89 - Zokoma Ndithu Nthawizi
content:
# 89 - Zokoma Ndithu Nthawizi 

    1. Zokoma ndithu nthawizi, Zakupemphera kwanuko, Ku mpando wa chifumuwo, Ndiuza zanga zonsezo; Pakundivuta m’mtimanga, Ndimamuuza Yesuyo, Pakundiyesa mdaniyo, Ndinena kwa Ambuyeyo.   2. Zokoma ndithu nthawizi, Zopempha kwa Mulunguyo, Kwa Yemwe ali wo’natu, Kwa Iye wodalitsa ’fe. Ndilakalaka Iyeyu, Amene ’nandiferatu, Posautsika m’dzikoli, Ndipempha m’dzina la Yesu.   3. Zokoma etu nthawizi, Za kupemphera Mbuyeyo; Zimandisangalatsa ’ne, M’mavuto anga onsewo. Ndilakalaka mphotho ya Kumwamwamba komweko. Ndigwira mosalekatu Pakupemphera kwanuko.

title: 91 - Linda Ndi Kupemphera
content:
# 91 - Linda Ndi Kupemphera 

    1. Dikirani lero nthawi ili kutha; Mungagwe m’zoipa linda ndi pemphero; Thupi ndi lofoka mdaniyo ngwa mphamvu; Dikirani nonse Mkwati ali kudza. CHORUS: Linda pempha, linda pempha; Usiku ndi usana dikirani ndi kupemphera. (Tenor and Bass) Linda pempha, linda pempha; Linda pempha, linda pempha; Usiku ndi usana dikirani ndi kupemphera.   2. Dzukani m’sagone musamakaika; Mudzalandiratu mpumulo kumwamba; Linda ndi pemphero, Mpulumutsi wanu, Anasautsidwa chifukwa cha inu   3. Khulupira Yesu mdani ali pompoVala zida zako mpaka Mbuye adze, Musachedwe konse lero ndi labwino, Dikirani nonse ndi kupempheranso.

title: 90 - Ntchito Ya Pa Mlungu Yatha
content:
# 90 - Ntchito Ya Pa Mlungu Yatha

    1. Ntchito ya pa mlungu yatha, Sabata lina layamba; Moyo wangawe pumula, Mlungu wadalitsa lero.   2. Idza yamika Ambuye, Yemwe apatsa mpumulo; Timadalitsidwa lero, Koposa masiku ena.   3. Mayamiko athu m’mwamba, Akweratu monga nsembe; Kuti Khristu atipatse Dalitso m’mitima yathu.   4. Mpumulowu uli ngati Fanizo la wakumwamba, Komwe mpingo udzapuma, Zitatha zowawa zonse.

title: 92 - Msaiwale Tsiku La Mbuye
content:
# 92 - Msaiwale Tsiku La Mbuye 

    1. Msaiwale tsiku la Mbuye wathuyo. Ndi tsiku lopambana masiku enawo; Ndi tsiku lakupuma ndi  la chimwemwecho, Kuwala kwake kuli kochoka mmwambamo. CHORUS: Tikondwera kudza kwa Sabata lakelo. Tikondwera kudza kwa Sabata lakelo.   2. Sunga tsiku lake lopatulikalo, Pembedza mwini njira yakunka mmwambamo; Tikamtsatira Iye pa dziko linotu, Adzatipatsa madzi a moyo wakewo.   3. Timyimbira Yesu pa tsiku lonseli, Ambuye ali Bwenzi la ana onsewo. Wokoma mtima ndinu, Mukhale nafetu, Munalonjeza kuti mudzadza m’mtimamu.

title: 93 - Sabata Nla Kupuma
content:
# 93 - Sabata Nla Kupuma 

    1. Sabata nla kupuma, Ndi la chimwemwecho, Ndi tsiku lotonthoza, Lokometsetsatu; Akulu ndi ang’ono, Tigwade tonsefe, Tiyimbe kwa Woyera Wa nthawi zonsezo.   2. Sabata lili ngati Chotchinjiriza ’fe, Ndi monga ngati munda Wotupa mdambomo; Litsitsimutsa m’yoyo Ya akutopawo, Popuma pa Sabata Tiona mwambamo.   3. Ndi tsiku lakusinkha, Ndi la chikondicho, Lakuyanjana nazo Za mwambamwambamo; Tipeze zakukoma Zoposa zinazo, Tifuna kupumula Kosatha mwambamo.

title: 94 - Skulu Ya Sabata
content:
# 94 - Skulu Ya Sabata 

    1. Skulu ya Sabata ndithu, Yokondedwa ndine; Mtima wanga uikonda, Skulu ya Sabata. CHORUS: Skulu ya (bwino), Sabata (bwino), Skulu ya (bwino), Sabata (bwino), Mtima wanga uikonda, Skulu ya Sabata.   2. Ndi mmenemo mtima wanga, Uyamba kudziwa; Ndinayamba kuikonda, Skulu ya Sabata.   3. Yesu ndi mau okonda, Andiitanatu; Ndipo ndisankha yekhayo, M’skulu ya Sabata.

title: 95 - Mulungu Watisunga ’Fe
content:
# 95 - Mulungu Watisunga ’Fe 

    1. Mlungu watisunga ’fe Mpaka mlungu winawu; T’yeni timpembedze ’Ye, Tsiku lopumulali; Tiganize zinthu za Mau a Mulunguyo. Tiganize zinthu za Mau a Mulunguyo.   2. Pakufuna nsisizo, Zakudzera m’dzinalo, Mudze, Mbuye wathu ’Nu, Mukhululukire ’fe; Pakupuma mwanumo, Tikumbuka Inuyo. Pakupuma mwanumo, Tikumbuka inuyo.   3. Pakulemekeza ’Nu, Tikuyandikira ’Nu; Tikuona mphamvuyo, Ndi ulemelerowo. Mtithangate Mbuyathu Kudya phwando m’mwambamo. Mtithangate Mbuyathu Kudya phwando m’mwambamo.   4. Mbuye mugonjetsetu Tchimo la mu mtimanga, Kuti ndikagwiretu Ntchito zokondwetsa ’Nu. Masabata onsewo Alingane momwemo, Masabata onsewo Alingane momwemo.

title: 96 - Idza Tsiku Lopuma
content:
# 96 - Idza Tsiku Lopuma 

    1. Idza tsiku lopuma, Lopatsidwa ku dziko. Idza mmtima mwangamu, Monga nyali ya mmwamba.   2. Tsiku lokondweretsa, Likupita msangatu; Litisangalatsanso Mpaka ntchito idzatha.   3. Tsiku loyeretsetsa, Tsiku lakupemphera; Tsiku lakulandira madalitso anuwo.   4. Idza tsiku lopuma ndi zimphamvu za mmwamba, Ndi kuyera kwanuko Kudze m’mtima mwangamu.

title: 97 - Tamva Mau Omwewo
content:
# 97 - Tamva Mau Omwewo 

    1. Tamva mau omwewo, Atitu Yesuyo; Mpulumutsi ndiyedi, Yesuyo, Yesuyo; Pita m’midzi monsemo, Dziko lonse limvetu, Pita iwe konseko, Mveratu Mbuyeyo.   2. Lalikani nanunso, Yesuyo, Yesuyo; Kwa ochima onsewo, Amve za mbuyeyo. Lalikani m’zisimo, Ndi m’mapiri monsemo; Kuti onse amvetu, Yesuyo, Yesuyo.   3. Yimbadi za Iyeyo, Amvetu anthuwo; Kuti Yesu wafadi, Kalelo, kalelo. Atikonda ifetu, Natifera indedi. Kuchotsera tchimoli, Yesuyo, Yesuyo.   4. Bukitsani maunso, Konseko, konseko. Aitana anthuwo, Ponsepo, ponsepo. Kodi wina samvatu? Pitako, pitako ’we, Angofuna onsewo, Yesuyo, Yesuyo

title: 98 - Mombolo Akhale Nane
content:
# 98 - Mombolo Akhale Nane 

    1. Mombolo akhale nane, Kwenda ndekha sinditha  Akhale pafupi nane, An’gwire m’dzanja lake. M’nchito yanu mndipatulire ’ne, Mwa cisomo canuco; Moyo wangawo uyang’ane ’Nu, Ndicitetu zanuzo.   3. Ndikondwera ’ne pakupitatu, Kugwadira Mbuyeyo; Pakunenenatu naye mtserimo, Monga bwenzi langalo.   4. Sindidziwatu za cikondico, Mpaka n’dzanke tsidyalo; Sindifikira za cimwemweco, Mpaka n’dzanke kwanuko.

title: 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi
content:
# 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi

    1. Inetu ndifunadi Kufanana ndi Yesu, Andidzaze mtimamo Ndi kufatsa kwaceko; Ndidziyenda monga ’Ye mdziko la zoipali; Ndine wosaukadi, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.   2. Ngati amva kwangwala, Nayang’ana mphetazo, Nasamala zonsezo, Ndithu andimveranso Adzandiphunzitsa ’ne, Nakhulukira ’ne; Ndikhaletu wagwiro, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.   3. Popemphera ndikhale Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo; Ndipumule mwa Iye, Andimwetse madziwo.

title: 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu
content:
# 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu 

    1. Yesu, mundisungetu, Mfupi mtanda wina  Ndipezemo kasupe wondiciza Mtima. CHORUS: Mtandawo, mtandawo, Nditamanda mtanda, Mpaka moyo wangawo Udzapume mmwamba.   2. Nsisi zandipezanso, Pomwe pali mtanda. Ee! Pa mtanda nthandayo Indiunikira.   3. Pa mtandapo ndiona Mwana wa Mulungu. Mndithandize, Mbuyanga, Kuyendabe nanu.   4. Pa mtandapo ndzalinda, Ndikuyembekeza, Mpaka ndidzfika ku Dziko la kumwamba.

title: 133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu
content:
# 133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu 

    1. Ndiyende nanu Mlungu ’Nu, Mongatu Enoke kalelo; Mndigwire dzanja langalo, Mulankhule ndi inenso; Ngakhale sindionatu, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga   2. Sin’funa Kwenda ndekhatu, Namondwe amaombabe; Misampha indicera ’ne, Adani andizinganso; Mutontholetse njanjayo, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.   3. Mukandigwira dzanjali, Nditayatu za dzikoli; Ndzayenda molimbikatu, Ndzasenza mtanda wangawao; Mpakatu ndzanke m’mwambamo, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

title: 134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse
content:
# 134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse 

    1. Ndi Mtima wanga wonsewo, Ndikweza mau kwanuko, Ndiyimbe bwanji cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye? CHORUS: Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo; Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo.   2. Cipatsa ’ne mtenderewo, Ciunikira m’njirayo, Cicotsa bvuto Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.   3. Ciyembekezo cangaco Conditurutsa m’macimo; Pakufa ndi’imba cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.

title: 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga
content:
# 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga 

    1. Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga, Koposa zonsezo; Cifukwa mwandipatsatu Mtendere wanuwo CHORUS: Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo), Za nsisi zacezo; Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo) Watsuka inenso.   2. Mukhala mfupi ndineyo, Koposa onsewo; Ndikonda kuganiza ’Nu Koposa zinazo.   3. Mwandikondwetsa, Mbuyanga, Ndisangalaladi; Popanda nsisi zanuzo Sindingakondwei.   4. Ambuye wanga, Yesuyo, Mkayenda nanedi, Masiku onse pansipo Ndidzakondweradi.

title: 136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako
content:
# 136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako 

    1. Akan’stogoza ndinkako, Ndikulupira Mbuyeyo; Ndikumbukira kutitu Anandifera pa mtanda. CHORUS: Yesu anditsogozatu Ulendo wanga wonsewo. Bwenzi loona ndiyeyo Ndkumbukira Mtandawo   2. Ndinkonda mau acewo, Anditsogoze Mbuyeyo; Kufuna kwace ndicite, Anandifera pa mtanda.   3. Ndzapita osaopai, Akhale nane Yesuyo. Pa tsiku lina n’dzaona Yesu tsamwali wa mtanda.

title: 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu
content:
# 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu 

    1. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Dziko ndi lacabetu; Nsisi zace zikhalitsa Nthawi zonse yemweyo. CHORUS: Nsisi zace n’zazikuru, Ndi cikondi cacenso; Ciombolo cozizwitsa, Moyotu wosathawo!   2. Dziko ai, koma Yesu, Wondisangalatsa ’ne; Iye andiyang’anira, Nkana m’bvuto ndi’mbabe.   3. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Ndiyang’ane Iyeyo; Pa ulendo wanga wonse, Andiunikira ’ne.   4. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Mtandawo ndigwiradi; Mpakatu maso ndi maso, Ndidzamone Mbuyeyo.

title: 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu
content:
# 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu 

    1. Ndipereka moyowu Kwa Ambuye wanga ’Nu; Manjawa acitetu Cifuniro canuco. CHORUS: Munditsuke ine Mtima mbu (e, Ine mbu) M’mwazi wa Ambuye Yesuyo (E, Yesuyo), Kwanu Mbuyanga ndiziperekadi, Kwanu nthawi zonsezo.   2. Ndipereka myendoyi, Ikhaletu yanuyo; Mau ayimbirenso Inu Mfumu yangayo.   3. Ndipereka milomo, Inetu mauwo; Ndipereka cumaco, Sindimana kanthui.   4. ndipereka nsikuzo, Kuti ndiyamike ’Nu; Ndipereka nzeruzo Kucitatu ntchitoyo.   5. Cifuniro cangaco Cikhaletu canunso; Ndipereka mtimanga, Ukhaletu wanunso.   6. Ndipereka cikondi Pa mapazi anuwo; Munditenge ndensene, Ndikhaletu wanuyo.

title: 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo
content:
# 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo 

    1. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandikonda kale; Kukonda kwandigwirako, M’kukondamo nditsale. Ku Mtima kundimangako, Kosamasuka konse, Ambuye ndine wanuyo, Ku nthawi nthawi zonse.   2. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandifera yekha; Anadipatsa moyowao, Ndatenga ine ndekha; Zimene ndiri nazozi, Za Yesu, mwini zonse Ndi moyo wanga wonse ndi Wacenso nthawi zonse.   3. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Ndapeza mphamvu zanga, Pakundisunga inemo, Ndiyende m’njira mwanga; Zolemera zoti mbe Zilimbitsa monse, Ndalema kuno komweko, Nkupuma nthawi zonse.   4. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Wokoma Mtima wace, Wotsogolera nzeruzo, Zisunga m’njira mwace; Kwa Iye wondikondako, Sandicotsamo konse, Pa moyo, imfa, nayeyo, Ndiripo nthawi zonse.

title: 140 - Mau A Yesu
content:
# 140 - Mau A Yesu 

    1. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Idza udzapume Wolema’we ndi zoipa, Tsamira pa Ine. Ndinadza kwa Yesu momwe ndinali  wolema; Mwa iye ndinapumula, Nandikondweretsa.   2. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndipatsa kolere Madzi a moyo wosatha, Idza udzamwetu Ndinadza kwa Yesu ndi ’mwa Mu mtsinje wamoyo Ndipo ndinatsitsimuka, Ndikhala mwa Iye.   3. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndine kuunika; Yang’ananitsa kwa ine, Ndipo udzakondwa. Ndinayang’ana kwa Yesu, Mwa Iye ndiwala; Ndidzayendabe m’ku’nika, Mpaka kumwambako.

title: 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu
content:
# 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu 

    1. Ndikhaletu wanu, Mbuyanga; Konseko, konseko, E! kufuna ndicite, Mndithandizetu. CHORUS: Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu, Mbuyana Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu leroli   2. Cuma ninji ko popanda Inuyo, Mbuyanga, Ndidzasiya zinthu zonsezo, Ndidzatsata ’Nu.   3. Pofulatire ’ne dzikoli, Mkhaletu nanenso; Inu ndinu Cuma cangacho; Mnditonthozetu.

title: 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli
content:
# 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli

    1. Tsiku lokoma leroli, Loposa enawao; La kuguniza zinathu za Mulungu wathuyo.   2. Inde, kukoma kumvatu Za mau acewo, Otembenuza mtimawo Kuloza mmwambamo.   3. Ngati sititha chimolo, Kusiya tokha ’fe  Ambuye wathu, Yesuyo, Adzaticotsatu.

title: 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse
content:
# 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse 

    1. Mbuye, mtipititse tonse, Ndi dalitso lanulo; Mwa cikondi canu, Mbuye, Mutipatse nsisizo. Mutitsitsimutse ife Pakuyenda m’dzikoli.   2. Tiyamika Inu, Mbuye, Kamba ka uthengawu; Mphatso za cipulumutso Zidzazetu mtimawu Kuti ife tikhalebe Okhulupirikawo   3. Nsiku zathu zonse, Mbuye, Tipereka kwanuko; Mutilimbikitse, Mbuye, Kuti tisatopei Mpaka tidzaone tonse, Ulemerero wanu.

title: 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo
content:
# 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo 

    1. Ndiitabe mtsogolomo, Ndikwera nthawi zonsezo; Ndipempha Inu, Mbuyanga, Mndikweze ’ne Pamwambapo. CHORUS: Mndikwezetu ’ne, Pamwamba nsika zonsezo; Pamene sin’nafikepo, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.   2. Sin’funatu kukhalabe Kumene kuli nkhawazo; Ngakhale ena ’khaleko, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.   3. Ndikhalebe pamwambapol, Ngakhale ndiyesedwa ’ne; Ndikhulupira kutitu, Mndikweza ’ne pamwambapo.

title: 145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu
content:
# 145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu 

    1. Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko afuna Iyeyo. Anaitana ’nu, Amaitanabe, Mudzakondweradi Pogwira ntchitoyo.    CHORUS: Bwerani, Msakane ntchitoyo, Bwerani, Kwa Mluungu wanuyo Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko Afuna Iyeyo.   2. Msakane ntchitoyo, Imvani leroli; Mwakana kalelo, Musakanenso bi! Zotuta nzambiri, acepa ’nchitowo, Mukondekondetu Kukopa anthuwo   3. Msakane ntchitoyo, Msacedwenso; Pakukanidwabe Cikondi cicoka  Pamene Mzimuyo Aloza njirayo, Popempa Yesuyo, Idzani leroli.

title: 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga
content:
# 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga 

    1. Mukhale m’mtima mwanga Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo Mudniyankhire ine mafunso angawo Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Mditsogoleretu, Kuti ndionetsere Ukuru wanuwo.   2. Kacisi wa mtimanga Wayeretsedwatu, Ulemerero wanu Uwale mkatimo; Ndi thupi langa lonse Likhale lanulo, Licite nthawi zonse Kufuna kwanuko   3. Ziwalo zanga zonse, Mzilamuliretu, Mucite nazo zonse Kufuna kwanuko; Ndizipereke ndense, osang’ungudzanso, Polamulidwa nanu Mu ntchito zangazo.  4. Ndidzapumula ndithu Mu Mtima mwangamo, Ndidzalindira Inu, Mukandifunatu; Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo, Mundiyankhire ine, Mafunso angawo.

title: 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi
content:
# 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi

    1. Tate mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifuna Inuyo; Mundiyangate mmanja mwanu, Ndipume mwanumo. CHORUS: Zingwe za cikondico, Mfupi, Zikokere ’ne; Mfupi, mfupi, Ndinu m’mwambamo.   2. Yesu Mundisendeze mfupi, Ndisasiye inu; Dzanja lanu linditsogoze, Ndisasocerei.   3. Mzimu mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifanane ndinuyo; Mtima mwangamo munditsuke, Ndiyere ine mbu!

title: 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu
content:
# 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu 

    1. Ponse ponse naye Yesu ndzapita, Ponse ponse anditsogolera ’ne. Pakapanda Iye sindikondwai, Ponse ponse naye sindiopatu. CHORUS: Ponsepo, Ponsepo, Sindiopai, Ponse ponse nay endidzapitapo   2. Ponse ponse Yesu ali ndi ine, Nkana ena andisiye m’dzikoli. Nkana njira yanga iri yoopsya, Ponse ponse ndimyamika Yesuyo.   3. Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndidzagonatu, Mmene mdima undiphimba ineyo. Ndziwa kuti ndidzauka tsikulo, Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndiko kwathuko.

title: 149 - Yenda Mkuunika
content:
# 149 - Yenda Mkuunika 

    1. Yenda nk’unika Kwaceko, Atsogolere ’we; Ndi Mzimu wa kumwambayo "Dzainga mdimawo. CHORUS: Yendanibe, Mkuunitatu; Yendanibe, Mkun’ikatu kwa Mlunguyo.    Bass and Tenor; Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo Yendabibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo; Mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo   2. Yenda mk’unika Yesuyo, Wowala m’mauyo Atsogolera onswe, Okhulupirawo   3. Nkana mithunzi igwetu, Kudetsa njirayo. Mdimawo udzathawatu, Ku’nika kwaceko.   4. Yenda mkk’unika kwaceko, Udziwe nsisizo Cikondi cidzaposadi, Pofika Mmwambamo.

title: 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?
content:
# 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?

    1. Okunkhawo alitu kutiko? Amene akunkhatu zabwino? Kucoka mu dziko loipali, Pocita ndi mau a Mlunguyo? CHORUS: Ndanitu adze kudzakunkha, Kusonkhanitsira anthu m’mwambamo? Ndi yani atithandizeko, Pofunafuna zobalazo?   2. Pitani mu mphambano monsemo, Funani mupezemo abwino; Pitani kwa anthu ponse ponse, Musonkhanitsire kumwambako.   3. Zobala zakhwima ponse ponse za m’dzikomu zilindira ife. Okuntha acepa ku ntchitoyi, Zambiri zidzaonongekatu.  4. Anthuni idzani ndi zidazo, Kudzasonankhanitsa za m’mundamo; Gwiranibe mpaka Ambuyeyo Adzabwera ali kukondwatu.

title: 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa
content:
# 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa 

    1. Ndiganiza za dziko lokometsalo, Komwe nzafikako tsikulo; Podzaima pa mbali M’lumutsiyo, Ndidzavala nyenyezizo ko? CHORUS: Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko, Mbuyanga, Mmene dzuwa lidzalowadi (lowadi) Mmene ndazuka mmalo a mpumulo, Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko (tsikulo)   2. M’mphamvu yaceyo ndigwiretu ntchitoyo, Kuti ndikopetu anthuwo; Kuti ndzapate nyenyezi pa tsikulo, Mmene Mbuye ’dzayamika ’fe.   3. Ndidzakondwera poona Mbuyanga, Ndikupereka mituloyo; Ndidzakondwera m’mzinda wa golidiwo, Ndikadzabvala nyenyezizo.

title: 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule
content:
# 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule 

    1. Yesu, Mundilankhule, Mau ofatsawo; Mndinong’oneze kuti, SUlitu wekha ’we. Mtima munditsegule, Kuti ndimvere ’Nu; Mdzaze mu Mtima wanga, Kuti ndikondwedi. CHORUS: Mundinong’onezetu, mwa nsisi zanuzo Udzagonjetsa ndithu, Udzamasukadi. Mundilankhule, Mbuye, Tsiku ndi tsikunso, Ndimvetu mau anu, Sulita wekha ’we   2. Yesu, munene mau Ndi ana anuwo, Kuyang’anira Inu, Muwapjunzitsetu; Kuti apereketu Moyo kwa inuyo, Udze ufumu wanu, Kuti ’dzaone ’Nu.   3. Kale munaonetsa Kufuna kwanuko, Yanga ndidziwe ntchito, Ndicite zanuzo; Ndilemekeze Inu, Kwa anthu onsewo, Ncite kufuna kwanu, Masiku onsewo.

title: 153 - Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga
content:
# 153 - Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga

    1. Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo; Mndipulumutse m’chimolo Lero lokha; Mau ndisalankhulenso Oipawo; Msungetu mlomo wangawu, Lero lino.   2. Ndzagwira ntchito yanuyo, Ndzapemphanso; Ndikhalal wacifundoyo, Lero lokha; Mundithandize, Mbuyanga, Kumera ’Nu; Kuti ndidzipereketu pa leroli.   3. Ngatitu moyo wangawo Utha ndithu; M’malonjezano anuwo ndikhalebe; Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo; M’ndisunge m’manja mwanumo pa leroli.

title: 154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine
content:
# 154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine 

    1. Mlonda, tandiuze ine, Kunja kuli cutako? Zosonyeza kudza kwace, Kodi zionekadi? Inde, Mlendo, taonanil, Kuca kwayandikiratu, Bvala za kukoma zako, Kuli kuca, dzuka ’we.   2. Mlonda, nyali iunika Mommo m’njira mwakomo; Zozizwitsa m’dziko monse, Zisonyeza tsikulo. Podzaomba pa lipenga, Pakudzuka a ku manda, Omwalira mwa Ambuye, Adzabvala cosafa.  3. Mlonda, pfu’la liri kudza Tsiku lalikurulo. Onse alalike kuti, Mfumu yayandkatu. Inde, mlendo ’we, ndiona, Dziko lopambana lija. Mzinda wopambana yonse, Uoneka tsidyalo.   4. Mlonda, undiuze ine, Za mu mzinda momwemo, Mmene Mfumu ikukhala, Pa cimpando caceco. Dziko lija likuwala Ndi ulemerero wace; Kuli dzuwa ndi mitengo, Ndi mitsinje yoposa.   5. Dzuwa lituruka ndithu, La usana womwewo. Onse alalike kuti, Tsiku layandikatu. Aulendo aonenso, Kuli phiri la Mulungu; Tidzafika, konko msanga, Tidzakondwererako

title: 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko
content:
# 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko 

    1. Kapenatu si ku phiriko, Kapena ku nyanjako, Kapena ku nkhondo komwetu, Mufuna ndipite ’ne; Komatu akandituma ’ne Ku dziko la ’lendowo, Ndilola mwa mphamvu ya Mbuyeyo, Ndzapita mufunako.    CHORUS: Ndzapita kulmene mufunako, M’phiri, m’dambo, ndi m’nyanja Ndzanena zimene mufunazo, Ndzatsata Mpulumutsiyo   2. Alipo mau Ambuyeyo, Afuna ndinetu; Kapena kuli wocimwayo Wosowa thandizoli; Ambuye, mkanditsogoza ’ne, Ingabvute njirayo, Ndzauza uthenga wabwinowo, Ndzanena mufunazo.   3. Alipo malo a inenso Ku munda wa Mbuyeyo, Ndzagwira ntchito yotutayo Ya Yesu wopacikwa. Pokhulupirira mwanumo, podziwa mndikonda ’ne, Ndzacita kufunatu kwanuko, Ndzakhala mufunazo.

title: 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka
content:
# 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka 

    1. Mau akukwiya leka, Musanene konsetu; Muwauze mau onse Asanadetse m’lomowo. CHORUS: Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani malamulowo; Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani lamulo.   2. Cikonditu ndi coyera, Ndi cibwenzi comwenso, Musaciononge konse Ndi mau akukwiyawo.   3. Maubwenzi amasweka, Ndi mabanja omwenso; Ka’mba mau a kukwiy aOlankhulidwa mwa nsontho.

title: 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira
content: # 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira

title: 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika
content:
# 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika 

    1. Masika a dziko ayandikatu, Aitana Mbuye okololawo; Ndi mina yeyera pa dziko lonse, Ndi mwini zotuta wayandikanso. CHORUS: ’Dzanitu msanga, Tengatu zotuta; Mdzatitengae ’fe, Kwathuko Alto, Tenor, ndi Bass; Idzanitu angelo, msangatu; Tengereni zotuta mmwambamo. Mudzatengetu ife, kunkatu, Kwathu mmwambamo.   2. E, tsiku lopanda misozi konse, Layandika kudza mothamangatu; Akubalalika ndi ucimowo, Mwasonkhetu nthawi isanathei.   3. Ikomatu ntchito ya cikondico, Kasupe wosaphwa wa kumwambako; Cikonditu ndico ciitana ’fe, Cigwiritsa ntchito, Cibalitsatu.

title: 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu
content:
# 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu 

    1. Mbuyanga, ndisowa Inu! Ndine wosaukadi; Mundigwire dzanja, Mbuye, Mudnilimbikitsetu. CHORUS: Nthawitu zonsezo, Ndimasowa Inu, Mbuye! Nthawitu zonsezo, Yesu mundisunge ’ne.   2. Mundibveke zakuyera, Zanga ziri sanzatu; Mndiphunzitse kupemphera, Mundipatse mphamvuzo.   3. Mudnitsogolere, Mbuye, Ndekha ndilepheradi; Myende nane pa myalapo, Ndinu nyali yangayo.   4. Ndigapezetu mabvuto, Ofiritsa mtimanga; Ndidzaumirira Inu Mdzandisangalatsadi.

title: 160 - Yesu Andisungetu!
content:
# 160 - Yesu Andisungetu! 

    1. Yesu andisungetu! Ndi mphamvu yaceyo; Dziko lisandidetse; Kuti nditsate ’Ye. CHORUS: Yesu andisungetu! Mbuye ndipempha ’Nu; Inetu ndine cabe, cabe, Inu ndi zonsezo.   2. Yesu andisungetu! Nditumikire ’Ye; Ndicitetu kufuna, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo.   3. Yesu andisungetu! Dziko ndilisiya; Ndikhaletu wofatsa, Woyera mtimamo.   4. Yesu andisungetu! N’khaletu waceyo; N’khaletu wace yekha, Ku nthawi zonsezo.

title: 161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye
content:
# 161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye 

    1. Tsamwali ndiri naye Wolondakondadi; Akonda ’ne koposatu, Akonda konseko; Ndikhala ndi tsamwaliyo, Ndimkonda bwinotu; Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndikhalabe.   2. Ndifo’ka ndithu mwina, Adziwa Mbuyeyo Auza ’ne ndimtsamire, Andithangatatu; Anditsogoza inetu, Mwa kuunikako, Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndiyendabe.   3. Zokondwa, za cisoni, Ndiuza Mbuyeyo; Ndiuza Mbuye zonsetu Za Mtima mwangamo; Auza ’ne cocitatu, Anena, Yesanso; Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndinenabe.   4. Adziwa ndikufuna, Kukopa winayo, Auza ’ne kupitatu Kunena nayenso; Cikondi ca Mulunguyo, Ndi imfa ya Yesu; Pamodzi ndi Ambuye ndicitabe.

title: 162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu
content:
# 162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu 

    1. Yesu anditsogozatu; Nanganso ndifunanji? Kodi ndimkaika Iye, Wonditsogolerayo? Mtenderewo andipatsa, Mwa cikhulupiroco! Mkana lindigwere bvuto, Yesu athangata ’ne’ Mkana lindigwere bvuto, Yesu athangata ’ne;   2.
