# 225 - Uyang’ane Mdaniyo 

    1. Mkhristuwe dzuka! Alamula Mbuye;  Tenga cikopa, ndi lupanga m’dzanja, Ukomane naye, usamuope Ulimbe Mtima, Myang’ane mdaniyo. Refrain; Limba Mtima, Limba Mtima, Limba Mtima, Pom’yang’ana mdani.   2. Zoopsa ziripo, ucenjeretu, Usafulatire, ungapwekekwe; Unyinji wa ’dani, udzagonjetsa, Ulimbe Mtima, M’yang’ane mdaniyo.   3. Ntchito ya Mbuyako uiteteze; Dzukatu mwa cangu nkhondoyo ithe; Akakulamula, pita mwa cangu, Ulimbe Mtima M’yang’ane mdaniyo.   4. Pita limbikira, suli wekhai, Mwayi apatsa, cisangalatsonso; Mwayi apatsa, cisangalatsonso; Cikondi cace ngati mtsinje m’tengo; Ulimbe Mtima M’yang’ane mdaniyo

title: 226 - Pafupi Kukopeka
content:
# 226 - Pafupi Kukopeka 

    1. Pang’onong’ono kukopedwa; Pang’onong’ono kumlandira, Wina akutero, "Pita, Mzimu, pita, Ndikaona nthawi n’kuitana."   2. Pang’onong’ono, lero idza; Pang’onong’ono usalubze, Yesu akwitana, angelo mpafupi, Anthu akupempha, Bweranitu.   3. Pangonong’ono mwayi wathaa; Pang’onong’ono tsoka ladza! Kucedwa simwayi, ndi tsoka loopsa. Ha, adaliradi, "Ndacedwatu!"

title: 227 - Pa Mtanda
content:
# 227 - Pa Mtanda 

    1. Ambuye mwazi nakhetsa, Mfumu yanga nifa, Naperekera mutuwo Mbozi ngati ine! CHORUS: Pa mtanda, pa mtanda ndaona kuwala, Colemetsa mtimanga cacoka; Mwa cikhulupiriro ndiona, Ndikondwera kosaleka.   2. Anabuula pa mtengo, Ndi zoipa zanga; Kuya cisomo citere, Cikondi cakuya!   3. Nzosatheka kubwezera Cikondi cotere; Ndingodzipereka Mbuye, Zokhazo ndicita.

title: 228 - Muyamikeni Yesu
content:
# 228 - Muyamikeni Yesu 

    1. Nyamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo! Yimba cikondi cozizwitsadi! Mkondwereni mkuru wa angelo m’Mwamba, Dzina lace lilimekezedwe! Monga mbusa asunga ana, M’mikono mwace awanyamula. CHORUS: Myamikeni! Ali wamkuru koposa; Myamikeni m’nyimbo zokondwera.   2. Myamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo! Zathu zocimwa nathira mwazi; Ndiye Thanthwe lathu la cipulumutso, Myamikeni Yesu wopacikikwa; Mbukitseni! Yesu wotithangata, Cikondi cosamariza ncace.   3. Myamikeni! Yesu wodala mombolo! Khomo m’mwamba mumveka hosanna! Yesu Mbuye alera nthawi zosatha; Mbveke krona Wansembe ndi mfumu! Kristu adza wogonjetsa dzikoli, Mphavu ndi ulemu ndi za Yesu.

title: 229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani?
content:
# 229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani? 

    1. Wa Yesuyo ndani? Ngoona; Mbali ndi ziwiri; Usankhe CHORUS: Sankha, sankha (Wa Yesuyo ndani? Wa Yesuyo ndani?) Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe Sankha, sankha, Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe.   2. Ambiri asankha Yoipa; Yosalimba ndi ya mabodza.   3. Gwirizana naye Ambuye, Ndiyo mbali yokha yolimba.

title: 230 - Ndine Njira
content:
# 230 - Ndine Njira

    1. Monga nkhosa zotayika, Zomwazika konse; Zasiya moyo, mtendere, Njira yandisowa? CHORUS: Sap, & alto: Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo   Sungafike Atate koma mwa Ine,   Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo,   Sungafike Atate komwa mwa Ine   Bass & Ten: Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moo   Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine   Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moyo   Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine   2. Nkhawa zandisokoneza, Mulungu ndifuna; Manena-nena ngambiri, Ndingagwire ziti?   3. Kwa Kristu, njira, co’nadi Ndi moyo ndibweranso; Adzandifitsa kwa Tate, Kumalo kosatha.

title: 231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima
content:
# 231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima 

    1. Kodi watopa nazo zoipa, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima; Ngati ufuna kutembenuka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima. CHORUS: Leka kukayikatu; Usamkanenso lero, Tsegula Mtima wako; Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   2. Ukafuna kukhala woyera, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima; Madzi osamba ali pafupi, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   3. Ngati muli bvuto mtimamo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima; Ngati wapereweza za m’dziko, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   4. Abwenzi akakusandukira, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima; Ndiye bwenzi losatekeseka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   5. Ngati uyimba nao odala, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima; Udzalowe m’nyumba za mpumulo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima. CHORUS (wotsiriza): Leka kukayikaku; Usamkanenso lero, Ndatsegula citseko, Kuti Yesu alowemo

title: 232 - Sindidzakusiya
content:
# 232 - Sindidzakusiya 

    1. Sindidzakusiya konse, Sindidzakukananso; Ndzatsogola ndzakusunga, Mongwa mwa dzina langa; Musaope coipaco, pomvera malangizo.   2. Mphepo zikaomba mkuntho, upemphere kwa Ine; Ndidzakufungata iwe, Kukusamala bwino; Poyesedwa konyazitsa, Ndidzakuyendetsa bwino.   3. Mlengalenga pong’azima pakakoma ponsepo, Madyerero osasowa, Zokondweretsa zokha; Ndidzakhala nawe ndithu, Ndi kuti usacimwe.   4. Ngati ndadodometsedwa, Ndi nkhawa ndi cisoni, Ngakhaletu kuli nkhungu, Ndidzakuunikira, Mbendera yokwezekayi, Ya cikondi canga njo.

title: 233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale
content:
# 233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale 

    1. Uze nthano yakale, Ya za kumwambako, Za Yesu wacifundo, Za Yesu wokonda; Pang’ono pang’onotu, monga kwa kamwana, Poti ndiri wotopa, wopanda thandizo. CHORUS: Nthano yakale uze, Nthano yakale uze, Nthano yakale uze, Ya Yesu wokonda.   2. Pang’ono ndi pang’ono, Motsimikizadi; Pakuti ndaipadi, Yesu nandifera; Nthano yonseyo uze, Musacite mphwayi, M’nthawi yonse ya bvuto, Andisangalatsa.   3. Nenatu yomwe ija, Ukhala ndi mantha, Kuti dziko loipa, Ndilikondetsetsa; Ulemu wa dzikowu Uyamba m’moyomu, Uze nthano yakale; Yesu akuciza.

title: 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko
content:
# 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko 

    1. Ha! Nayimba angelo, Yesu nyali ya dziko; Mwana wabadwa Mfumu, Yesu nyali ya dziko. CHORUS: Yenda m’kuunika kwabwiniko, Idza kumene kuli cifuno, Kuwala kwa msana ndi usiku; Yesu, nyali ya dziko.   2. Mapfukonu kondwani, Yesu nyali ya dziko; Kondwani ndi a m’mwamba, Yesu nyali ya dziko.   3. M’mwamba amlekeza, Yesu nyali ya dziko; Yesu Mbuye wosatha, Yesu nyali ya dziko.   4. Mfumu ya mtenderedi, Yesu nyali ya dziko; Dzuwa la cilungamo, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

title: 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula
content:
# 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula 

    1. Ladzanso tsiku lakupula, Lodalitsidwa ndi Mlunguyo; Iye napuma ntchito zacezo, Ndipo afuna tipumulenso.   2. Tiyeni tonse pa Sabatali, Timveretu Kufuna kwaceko; Tsono poyimba ndi kupemphera, Iye adzakondwera nafetu.   3. Mbuye, Muchere khutu lanulo; Mumve pemphero la t iana ’fe; Kumbukirani lonjezanolo, Mupulumutse otaikawo.   4. Inu, Atate wakumwambako, Ndinu wakuticinjiriza ’fe. Ndinu wakutitsogoleranso, Tikuongani nthawi zonsezo.

title: 236 - Cifundo Cace
content:
# 236 - Cifundo Cace 

     1. Dzuka moyo wanga kondwa, Yimbira cipulumutso; Ndimyimbire nyimbo; Cifuno cace; Ncoposa! CHORUS: Wacifuno, wacifundo cace, ncoposa!   2. ’Nandiona wotayika, Anandikondabe ndithu; ’Nabweza potayikane; Cifundo cace, Ncoposa!   3. Acurukadi adani, Ngakhale acite nazo, Moyo wanga asungabe; cifundo cace, Ncamphamvu!   4. Bvuto loda ngati mtambo, Lasonkhana ligundira, Aima pafupi nane; Cifuno cace, Ncokoma!   5. Mwini Mfumu akadzadza, Kudzatenga anthu ace, Ndikayimba pa tsikulo Cifundo cace, Kosatha!

title: 237 - Akristu Limbikani!
content:
# 237 - Akristu Limbikani!

    1. Akristu limbikani, imani mtimanji! Mbendera nyamulani, musanthenthemerebi. Wotsogolera wathu ndi Mwana wa Mulungu; Adzagonjetsa onse, adani athuwo.   2. Tigwire nkhondo yomwe ya Mbuye wathuyo; Ticotse zakuipa zokhala mtimamo. Sitikwanira tokha kuleka zinthu zomwe; Koma Mbuyathu Yesu atithangatatu.   3. Tsopano timenyana ndi zakuipazo, Pamene nkhondo yatha tidzanka kwathuko; Yesu adzalandira ankhondo ace onse, Adzakhalitsa naye Kumwamba komweko.   4. Limbikani anzathu! Msanga nkhondo itha Lero kuli cinkhondo, mawa tigonjetsa Kwa iye wolakika, adzakhala moyo; Pamodzi ndi Mfumuyo ’dzakhala kosatha.

title: 238 - Akulowa M’zipata
content:
# 238 - Akulowa M’zipata 

       1. Awa ndani pa tsidya la Nyanja, Omwe payola manda acetu, Akondwera mwa Yesu? Asamba m’mwazi Wace. CHORUS: Akulowa mzinda wa Yerusalemu, Asamba m’mazi (wace) wa nkhosa; Alowa m’zipata za Yerusalemu, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   2. Awa ndiwo anapeza Yesu, Pamene anali anyamata, Nalandira cisomo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   3. Awa ndiwo mansautso yao, Anapeza kupuma mwa Yesu, Mtendere mu mtimamo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   4. Iwo adapirira mabvuto, Anapyola pakati pa moto: Yesu ati idzani, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

title: 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?
content:
# 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa? 

    1. Kodi uli kulemedwa ndi zoipazo? Idza kuno ati Yesu, Pumako.   2. Ndikamzindikira n’inji Mbuye wangayo? Ali ndi mabala m’manja mwacemo.   3. Kodi ali ndi cilemba m’mphumi mwacemo? E! Cilembaco ca minga cirimo.   4. Ndikampeza ndikamtsata ninji pansi? Masauko ndi misozi ziripo.   5. Ndikamfunafuna Iye ndipezenjiko? Kumariza kwa cisoni conse.   6. Ndikampempha anditenge ati bwanji ko? Ati Yesu "Idza msanga, idzatu."   7. Kukamtsata, kukampeza ndisaukanji? Oyera, atumwi, ati idzani. Amen.

title: 240 - Pakhomo
content:
# 240 - Pakhomo 

    1. Mpulumutsi Pakhomopo! Agogoda mofatsa tu, Walindira, alindabe, Musamcitire cipongwe.   2. Akulangiza ugule Golide yo ndi Cobvala; Dzoza maso, muonetu, Ucotse zonyasa zako.   3. Mvera mau a umboni Ati usanke wacedwa; Uli wonyoza, wofunda! Khala cangu usanduke.   4. Ncito yayandika kutha, Kudandaulira kutha; Wonynsa anyansebe tu, Woyera akhalebe conco.   5. Lonyowa tsitsi ndi mame, Cifukwa akukondadi, Dzuka! Tsegula citseko; Muuze asacedwenso.   6. Alowe wokondedwayo; Upume pamaso pace. Mwa ciyanjano cokoma Ndzadye naye, Iye nane.

title: 241 - Dziko Labwino
content:
# 241 - Dziko Labwino 

    1. Ndapeza dziko lokoma, Ndi zinthu zonse ndi zanga; Zokometsetsa konseko, Usiku wandicokera. CHORUS: O, dzikolo, lokomalo, Pa phiri lokometsalo, Ndipenyetsetsa ku Nyanja, Manyumba andikonzera, Ndiyang’anitsa dzikolo, Komwe ndidzakhalitsako.   2. Ndiyenda ndi Mpulumutsi, Andikondwera m’njiramo; Anditsogolera bwino, Kumwamba ndikafikeko.   3. Mphepo zinunkhira bwino, Za mitengo ya dzikolo, Maluwa nao safota, Mitsinje simaumako.   4. Mphepo za kumadzulozo, Ndi nyimbo kumwambako, Angelo onyezimira Ayimba za mphamvu zace.

title: 242 - Codala Cikondi
content:
# 242 - Codala Cikondi 

    1. Codala cikondi, Cotiyanjanitsa! Ciyanjano ca akristu, Cifana ca mwamba.   2. Pa mpando, wa Mlungu, Wathu tipemphera; Tisowa cinthu cimodzi, Cotisangalatsa.   3. Timathandizana, Akatundu athu; Timalirirana tonse, M’zobvuta zathuzo.   4. Tikalekanatu, Timanva cisoni; Tiyembekezerebetu, Kudzakomananso.

title: 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe
content:
# 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe 

    1. Dzuka moyo wanga, Cotsa mantha ako; Nsembe ya mwaziwo, Cifukwa ca ine; Indiimira ku mpando, Indiimira ku mpando; Dzina langa lalembedwa.   2. Kumwamba alipo, Kundipembedzera, Cikondi caceco, Cinakhetsa mwazi; Anatifera tonsefe, Anatiferea tonsefe, Awaza mpando wansisi.   3. Mabala asanu, Anapwetekapo; Mutu "khululukani" Atitu "khululukani," Msalole wolapa afe!   4. Tate amamumva, Wodzozedwa wace; Sangacotse mwana, Wofika kwa Iye, Mzimu ubvomera mwazi, Mzimu ubvomera mwazi, Ndabadwira mwa mulungu.

title: 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu
content:
# 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu 

    1. ’Dza kwa YEsu, ’dza kwa Yesu ’Dza kwa Yesu lero, lero, ’dza kwa Yesu, ’Dza kwa Yesu lero.   2. Pulumuka, pulumuka, Pulumuka lero, lero pulumuka, Pulumuka lero.   3. Akhozadi, akhozadi, Akhozadi lero, lero akhozadi, Akhozadi lero.   4. Muitane, muitane, Muitane lero, lero muitane, Muitane lero.   5. Alindira, alindira Alindira lero, lero alindira, Alindira lero.   6. Mkhulupire, mkhulupire, Mkhulupire lero, lero mkhulupire Mkhulupire lero.   7. Adalitsa, adalitsa, Adalitsa iwe, iwe adalitsa, Adalitsa iwe.

title: 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina
content:
# 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina

    1. Dzina lokhalo la Yesu, Ndilo dzina lokoma; Likondwetsa ’ngelo m’mwamba, Ndi Akhristu tonsefe. CHORUS: Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu, Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu.   2. Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu, Pamene ndibvutika; Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu pamene ndikondwera.   3. Ndikufuna kudzamwona, Podza mu’lemerero, Ndidzamve Wacita bwino, Ndidzakondwererako.   4. Ngat’ afuna ngwire ntchito, M’munda wace wa mpesa, Kuli bwino Yesu yekha, ’Dalitse ntchito zanga.   5. Ngat’afuna kuti ndife, Akhudze thupi langa, Kukhale bwino ndi Yesu, Ndikhulupira mwa’ye.

title: 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu
content:
# 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu 

    1. Mnenere Yesu liu; Bwenzi la pamtima, Utiuzetu zomwe; Anakucitira. CHORUS: Pomunenera Yesu Zidzatithandiza; Mau pang’ono pokha, Nenga, yimba, pempha.   2. Mnenere Yesu liu; Wakhululukidwa, Ndi kuyesayesako, Ufike kumwamba.   3. Mnenere Yesu liu, Kukana sinditha; Ndikonda Mpulumutsi, Wondiombolayo.   4. Mnenere Yesu liu, Usataye nthawi; Wozemba ntchito yace, Apeza cisoni.   5. Mnenere Yesu, liu, Pocepa nkhongono; Dzuka ukafooka, Mlekere zinazo.

title: 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba
content:
# 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba 

    1. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwemwe, Akatembenuka wocimwa; Tate amucingamira kunjira, Mwana wotopa wosocera. CHORUS: Angelo ayimba kumwamba; Ulemu, ulemu m’mingoli, Opulumukawo abvekedwa mbu, Ayimbira molemekeza.   2. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwe Wotayika wabvomeredwa; Wocimwayo wabwezedwa ku chimo, Wabadwanso ngati walero.

title: 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita
content:
# 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita

    1. Cikhamuci cifunanji Coyenda motanganidwa. Cosankhana tsiku ntsiku? Ndiuzenji acitanji? Khala cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita" Khalal cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita.’’   2. Yesuyo ndani? Wakuti agwedeza mudzi conci? Mlendo cabe waluntha Kugwedeza anthu conci? Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita," Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   3 . Yesu! Pansi natsikira Ngati munthu nayendapo; Opsinjika nawapeza, Odwalal opundukawo, Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita," Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   4. Lero ayenda ponsepo Tiona mapazi ace; Ayenda m’nchito zathuzo, Adza kwathu kudzakhala; Mokondwa tipfuulitse: "Yesu Mnazarete apita; Mokondwa tipfuulitse; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   5. Idzani olemedwanu! Mupume mpeze mudziwo Otayika a Atate, Bwerani mulandire; Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita," Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita."   6. Ukanabe naitana, Nunyoza cikondi cace, Cisoni adzakusiya Maomboledwe acewo; Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi." Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."

title: 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo
content:
# 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo

   1. Nkhosa zace zambiri m’kholamo Anasunga mbusayo Anasunga mbusayo Imodzi inasocerera, Yotaika ku thengo. Kutari ku phiri loopsya Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo.   2. Mbuye, muli zambiri m’kholamu Kodi sizikwanira? Nayankha mbusa, ndi yangayo Imene yataika. Ngakhale njoopsya njirayo, Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza. Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.   3. Koma opulumuka sadziwa M’khwawa mbusa napyola, Ndi mdima wo’psya usikuwo Polonda nkhosayo. Anamva kulira kutari Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa. Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.   4. Mbusa, ndiona mwazi m’njirayi; Ndi cifukwa ciani ko? Ndinaukhetsa potsata’we, Kubwenza ku kholako. Ndi m’manja mwalaswa bwanjimo? Ndalaswa pofunafuna’we. Ndalaswa pofunafuna’ we.   5. Ndipo ponse pa phiri ndi m’dambo, Ndi m’makwawa ponsepo Namveka liu lopfuula, Kondwerani ndapezayo. Angelo a Mlungu nayankha. Ambuye napeza nkhosayo. Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.

title: 250 - Chimo Musalole
content:
# 250 - Chimo Musalole

    1. Chimo musalole, Limacimwitsa, Gonjetso limodzi Libweza wina; Pitani m’tsogolo, Zoipa leka, Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga. CHORUS: Funsa Mbuye thandizo Aszakusunga iwe; Ali wolola Iye; Adzasunga iwe.   2. Thawani oipa, Ndi otukwana, Lemekeza Mlungu, Osamamnyoza; Khala waulemu, Ndi wacifuno, Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.   3. Kwa wolakikayo, Korona ’patsa, Mwa cigonjetsoco, Kwa opirira; Mpulumutsi wathu, Adzalimbitsa, Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

title: 251 - Kulira Sikanthu
content:
# 251 - Kulira Sikanthu

    1. Kulira sikanthu  Ngakhale nkhope igwe, Singaletse matsoka, Singatsuke machismo  Kulira sikanthu. CHORUS: Yesu nafa pa mtanda, Yesu nandiferatu, Yesu andilindira Kundi pulumutsa.   2. Nchitonso sikanthu  Ngakhale ikometse Maganizo oyera, Sangandikonzetsenso  Nchitonso sikanthu.   3. Kudikira sikanthu  Ndigona wotayika Ndimva kuitanantu; Kudika ndifa cabe  Kudika sikanthu.   4. Yesu Mpulumutsi Amene nandifera, Ndikhulupira Inu, Mundipulumutsenso  Mundipulumutsa.

title: 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera
content:
# 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera

    1. Wocimwa iwe, bweratu, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo; Atero Iye, pumatu, Umvere mauwo. CHORUS: Khulupira mau ace onse a Mbuyathuyo, Uli nawo pakumvera, Inde, moyowo.   2. Ambuye Yesu anatsira Mwazi wace pyu, Timira m’mwazi womwewo, iyerayera mbu.   3. Wa moyo ndiye Yesudi, Zoona zacezo, Akhalal iye njiratu yofika mmwambamo.   4. Tiyeni tonse, tinkeko, Ulendo wathuwo, Ku dziko lace mmambamo, ’Dzakhale nayeko.

title: 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli
content: # 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli

title: 254 - Dzina La Yehova
content:
# 254 - Dzina La Yehova

    1. Dzina la Yehova, Liyamikidwetu, tilopa; Kumwamba-mwambako, Cikondi coposa, Konseko kumveka Mphamvu yace.   2. Lipenga limveke Lacigonjetsoco, konse konse; Mngoli ukhalepo; Alimba abwino; Amveke ponsepo, omtamanda.   3. Poyimba mokweza, Kungani zingwezo, zotengana! Atipatsa mpweya; Mpweya wodzazatu, Ufulu wacewo, Tiyamike.

title: 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu
content:
# 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu 

    1. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndiri waumphawi; Mlendo wopanda malo, Za dziko ndilibe. A Yesu Mudnikonde, Mundicingamire, Ndikunditsogolera, Mphamvu yanga ndinu.   2. Ndisowa Mtima wanu, Kudziwa nkhawazo, Ndi mayesero anga, Ndi zacisonizo. Nsowa Mzimu Woyera, Womandiphunzitsa, Kundiuzane Yesu, Ndi Mwana wa nkhosa.  3. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndionane nanu, Mu uta-wa-lezamo, Pa cimpando canu. Ndi ogulidwa m’mazi, Ndikakondwerere Nyimbo zosadukiza, Ndikumpenyetsetsa. Amen.

title: 256 - Mulungu Munathangata
content:
# 256 - Mulungu Munathangata

    1. Mulungu munathangata, Mudzathangathabe; Woticinjiriza mz’opsa, Kwanu mutifitse!   2. Mwa mthunzi wa mpando wanu, Ndimo tibisala Dzanja lanu liposadi, Tiri mosunguka.   3. Dziko linakhazikidwa Mapiri naima, Mulungu wosamariza, Zako zosathera   4. Zaka ngati usiku, M’mawa kusanace.

title: 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe
content:
# 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe

    1. Mapiri sagwedezeka, Ifenso comweco; Olimba gwa ngati thanthwe; Ace a Yehova.   2. Phiri ndi khoma kulibe, Lofanana naye; Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.   3. Khulukirani anu, kwa zolakwa zao zonse, Mutithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo
content:
# 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo 

 1. Lamulo la Mulunguli, Sicinthu copanda pace;Ndi lokhalitsa myayadi, Simau cabe, ndi moyo.2. Lamulo lanu loyera, Mutikhulukirefe,Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.3. Khululukirani anu, Kwa zolakwa zao zonse,Mithithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?
content:
# 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?

    1. Tidzakomana patsidya, Mafunde akadzatha? Kowala kosalekeza, Kulibe cisoninso? CHORUS: Tidzakomanako? Tidzakomane patsidya? Tikakomane patsidya, Mabvuto akadzatha?   2. Tikakomana padoko, Akadzatha mabvuto? Tidzaiponya nangula Pagombe lokomalo?   3. Tikakomana m’mudzimo; Nyumba zonyezimira, Makomanso nga yasipi, omangidwa ndi Mbuye?   4. Tikakomana ndi Yesu Potenga anthu ace; Ubwino tidzaudziwa Ntakhala mu mpando’ce.

title: 260 - Dambo La Byula
content:
# 260 - Dambo La Byula

    1. Ndipitira kunsi kwa dambo la cipululu, Liri dambo lokongola lochedwa la Byula Koma ndapezanso monse momera maluwa, Mpulumutsi mwini wace ayenda ndi ine.   2. Palibe mthunzi wotsiriza panjira panga, Kuunika kwa ulemerero kuwalitsa; Am’mwamba andiyimbira nyimbo zokongola, Apokolezana bwino kundicingamira.   3. Ndiri kunka ndi nsangala ku mzinda wowala, Nsangalazo ziwalitsa njira tsiku ntsiku; Ndasendeza zipata za mzinda wakuwala Khwalalalo lindifitsa mzinda wa cikondi.

title: 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene
content:
# 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene

    1. Dambo labwino Edene, Muli bata msana; Mitima ya otopabe Ipuma nicira. CHORUS: Dambo labwino Edene, Kwao kwa odala, Ndazunzikadi ndi mabvuto, Ndidzatu ndidzapume.   2. Mtima wosowa woliraa, Ndzapeza mwayi, Nuimba nyimbo nda’ngelo, Akutaritari.   3. Ali kwao Mpulumutsi; Ndi oomboledwa Dziko la ulemerero, Imvani nyimboyo.

title: 262 - Kristuu Kapena Barab
content:
# 262 - Kristuu Kapena Baraba

    1. Nditani naye Yesu? Waima panoyu Wabvala cinyong’onyo, Ndi minga pamutu. CHORUS: Tsopano ndifunse, Muyankha cotani? Ndimpacike Mfumu Yesu, Atsale Baraba?   2. Ndimasule mbalayi, Cimunthu ca dama? Wocimwa, ngosacimwa? Mukanapo yani?   3. Funsotu loopsali! Litengeni bwino, Nsisi zilindirabe, Koma mwa mabvuto.   4. Mpando waciweruzo sungakane dziko? Anapfuula "Cotsa, Mumpacike Yesu!"   5. Si kwa ocimwa okha Funso linenetse; Mvani Akristu nomwe, Ora loyesedwa

title: 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye
content:
# 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye

    1. ’Mvani mau a Ambuye wathuyo Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe, Perekani ndi mitima yanuyo, Mulandire madalitso. CHORUS: Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe, Mndidyese ’ne, eti Mbuyeyo. Ndizakupatsa madalitso, Ndipo mudzasowa nawotu malo.   2. Mukufuna kodi mphamvu yaceyo? Mudze nazo zacikhuumi m’nkhokwe ’Dzanitu cifupi ndi Ambuyeyo, Polandira madalitso.   3. Muli nako kanthu ndi Ambuye ko? Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe, Mudze nazo monga mwa lonjezo ’ce, Ndipo mudzadalitsidwa.   4. Yamikani Mbuye pompemphera ’Ye, Podza nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe, Khulupirirani mau acewo, Ndi kumuthokoza Iye.   5. Yimbirani ndi cimwemwe nyimbozo, Mutabwera nazo zacikhumi, Tipfuule mokondwera tonsefe, Ka’mba tinadalitsidwa.

title: 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo
content:
# 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo

    1. Paciyambi Mulunguyo Analenga dzikoli, Tsono ’napumuladi Lacisanu nciwiri. CHORUS: Tikondwera, tikondwera Tikondwera podza pa Tsiku la Sabatalo.   2. Mlungu ’napatulanso Tsiku lakupumalo. ’Nalipatsa kwa ife Ndi Sabata lacelo.   3. Anthu ace kalelo Anasunga tsikulo, Ndi pobwera Yesuyo Iye anasunganso.   4. Osanthula m’bukumo, Akuona kutitu Mlungu sanasinthei, Tsiku ndace lomweli.   5. Ndipo ati m’bukumo Podzabwera Yesuyo Anthu adzasungabe Tsiku la Sabatalo.

title: 265 - Mtenderewo
content:
# 265 - Mtenderewo

    1. Mtenderewo, m’dziko la mdimali; Mwazi wa Yesu unong’oneza.   2. Mtenderewo, m’ntchito zocuruka; Ntchito ya Yesu ndiko kupuma.   3. Mtenderewo, m’bvuto lotizinga; Mtendere uli mwa Yesu yekha.   4. Mtenderewo, anga ali m’tari Yesu asunga ine ndi iwo.   5. Mtenderewo, uli m’tsogolomo; Tidziwa Yesu ali pa mpando.

title: 266 - tNdidzakutsatani
content:
# 266 - tNdidzakutsatani

    1. Yesu nditsata Inu, Ndamva mundiitana; Nkonda Inu, ndidzadi, Munditsogolere. CHORUS: Ndikutsatani, ndikutsatani, Ndikutsatani komwe muntsogoza.   2. Timaso tiphophonya, Mapazi asocera; Ndifooka mwinamo, Mundilimbikitsa.   3. Zisoni zindipinga, Ndipusa ndi zoipa, Ndidzalimbikitsidwa, Potsatira Inu.

title: 267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi
content:
# 267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi

    1. Tisonkhanitse zabwino, M’njira mwathu monsemo; Tisunge tirigu yekha, Titaye zacabezo; Tipeze zokondweretsa M’madalitso a lero, Mwa cipiriro ticotse Minga yokhumudwitsa. CHORUS: Ufese zacifundo, Ufese zacifundo Ufese zacifundo, Zomwe tidzakolola   2. Sitisamala maluwa Ndi mbalame poyimba, Mpaka mbalame ndiponso maluwa zitacoka; Dzuwa sitisamala Pa nthawi ya cilimwe, Akafikanso mazizi Nthaawiyo tilifuna.   3. Mwana akacita ngozi Poswa cikho comwera Kodi mukalipa ko’psa Poturutsa tsinyalo? Mukudziwa kuti mawa Adzakhala wakufa, Kodi pakukwiya naye Mupsa Mtima leroli?   4. Poganizira za m’mbuyo Za zomwe tinacita, Za mauwo okalipa Okhumutsidwa ena, Ndi nchito zosaganiza; Izi zitikumbutsa Kufetsatu zacifundo zomwe tidzakolola.

title: 268 - Bata Ndu!
content:
# 268 - Bata Ndu!

    1. Mbuye, Nyanja yakalipa, Mafunde akweretsa! Mlengalenga nawonso wada; Kodi tifere m’madzi; Kodi simukusamala, Mugoneranjiko? Pamene ife tiri ndi mantha, Kodi tifere m’madzi? CHORUS: Namondweyo andimvera Ine, bata ndu! (Bata ndu!) Ngakhale Nyanja zikalipe, Ziwanda, anthu, ngakhale zinazo, Madzi sangamize bwato Mwini Nyanja ndi mtunda ali momwemo; Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batu ndu, bata ndu! Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batadi ndu!   2. Mbuye bvuto mu mtimamu Landibvuta leroli; Kucirimika konse kwatha; Ndipulumutsenitu Nkhwenkhwe ya chimo yozunza, Inditsirizitsa; Ndamuka ine, ndamuka, Mbuye! Dzandipulumutseni.   3. Mbuye zobvutazo zatha, Kwagwa bata tsopano, Kwawalal ngati kalirole, Ngati ndiri Kumwamba; Msandisiyenso Ambuye, Tikhale Pamodzi; Ndikafike ku gombe lodala, Mukandipumulitse.

title: 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
content: # 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu

title: 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu
content:
# 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu

    1. Mpulumutsi potsazika, Ndi mau okonda, Msangalatsi, adzakhala Nkhoswe yathu.   2. Anadza kudzatikonza, Wansisi, wolola Kupeza mmodzi wodekha Apumemo.   3. Timva mau’ce odekha Ocokera m’mwamba, Otsutsa chimo odekha aitana   4. Ukoma wonse ndi wace, Cigonjetso conce, Ganizo laciyeronso, Zonse nzace.   5. Mzimu wanu waciyero, Mtimvere nsisitu; Mukhale m’mtima mwathu, Ana ace.

title: 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru
content:
# 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru

    1. Nkana chimo nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe; Nkana chino nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe; Nkana chimo ngori’ra, ayeretsedwa; Nkana chimo nlikuru, Nkana chimo nlikuru, Lingakanganulidwe; Lingakanganulidwe.   2. Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo;" Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo." Ali ndi nsisi zambiri, ndi cikondico. Imva liu lipempha, Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo: Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."   3. Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso; Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso; "Ndiyang’aneni anthuni," ati Mbuyeyo Akukhululukira, Akukhulukira, Sadzakumbukiranso, Sadzakumbukiranso.

title: 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo
content:
# 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo

    1. Pabvuta pa Nyanja, ponya cingwe, Pali mbale apulumutsidwe; Mbale wa mnzathu, ndani angathe Kuponya cingweco, kumpulumutsa. CHORUS: Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo! Alikunka ndi madzi! Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo! Wina amira lero.   2. Ponya cingweco mofulumira; Ucedweranji ndi kujejema? Ana amira, fulumiratu, Ukampumulutse msanga, msangatu.   3. Ponya anthuwo azunzikatu, Atatha koopsa sungafike; Mphepo zabvuto ndi za matsoka. Msanga ziwatsitsa kwakuya kwa bi.   4. Nyengo yowapulumutsa itha, Atifera posacedwea pano; Kangaza mbale usacedwetse, Ingoponya cingwe apulumuke.

title: 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu
content:
# 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu 

    1. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Akuthangate athagata; Ukamkhulupira ndithu, Adzakusangalatsa. CHORUS (Sap. & Tenor): Tsamiratu m’cikondi cace; Tsamiratu, yesa cifundo; Tsamiratu, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi. (Bass & Alto): Tsamiratu Iye, m’cikondi cace, Tsamira Iye, yesa cifuno; Tsamiratu Iyel, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi.   2. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzauza njira adzauza; Ingotsala mokondwera, pomvera mau ace.   3. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzakusamala, kusamala! Katundu wolemeretsa Mpereke kwa Ambuye.   4. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Msiyire zonse, zonsezodi! Mtima wace ngwacikondi, Maso ace sasinza.

title: 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye
content:
# 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye

    1. Ndiri ndi Mbuye wodandaulira, Akonda Iyeyu kuposa dziko; Pano andiyang’anira mwacifundo, Ndifunatu akhale wa inunso! CHORUS: Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,   2. Ndiri ndi Tate andipatsa ine Ciyembekezo ca moyo wosatha; Sacedwa kuitana tipite kwathu; Ndifuna adzalandire inunso!   3. Ndiri n’zobvala, zopanda mabanga Aindilindira mu ulemelero; Wowalal monsemo konko ndizalandira, Bwenzi ndifuna ukalandirenso!   4. Pamene Yesu wakupeza iwe, Tauzatu ena za mtendererewo Mwini ndiye Kristu yemweyo apatsa, Mtendere ndifuna mulandirenso!

title: 275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?
content:
# 275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?

    1. "Kosatha! - n’kuyi?" Ndilo funsolo; Konse komwe uli liri komweko! Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha! Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!   2. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha n’kuti? Ndi oomboledwa? Ndi otaika? Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"   3. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Uchitiranji Zokondwa za dziko mosaganiza? Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha n’kuti?   4. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Bwenzi samala; Adzaweruzatu Mulungu msanga Lero linganene - "kosatha! N’kuti?" Lero linganene - "Kosatha! N’kuti?   5. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha! N’kuti?" Bwenzi usagone, lekana m’dziko, Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N ’kuti.

title: 276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe
content:
# 276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe

    1. M’kola mwa ng’ombe mu Betlemumo, anabadwa ambuyangawo      Etu, ndidziwa, natsikirako, Kufuna inetu      Afuna inetu, afuna inetu.      Etu, ndizizwa, natsikirako, Afuna inetu.   2. Popacikidwa pa Kalvarepo, Yesu anandiombolerako, Inde, ndidziwa, nakondaneko, Nafera inetu. Nafera inetu, Nafera inetu. Inde ndizizwa nakondaneko, Nafera inetu.   3. Mbusa wokoma ndi Mbuyangayo, Nandiitana posocerapo, Konse koipa nalondaneko, Kubweza inetu Abweza inetu, abweza inetu Konse koipa nalondaneko, Abwenza inetu.   4. Uko kumwamba, Mbuyangayo, Nandikonzera mokhaliramo, Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu Atenga inetu, atenga inetu. Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu.

title: 277 - Tsogolere Muuni
content:
# 277 - Tsogolere Muuni

    1. Tsogolere muuni mu mdima, Tsogolere; Kwada ndiri kutari ndi kwathu; Tsogolere Sindipempha kuona za m’tari, Phazi langa limodzi likwana   2. Sindinali wotere wokhoza kupemphera; Ndisankha njira’nga; Tsogolere; Ndinakonda zinthu zacibwana, Tsogolere; Ndinanyada, musazikumbuke   3. Mphamvu yanu yandidalitsadi; Intsogoza Mu malo monse moipa mpaka mdima watha; M’mawa ’ngelo andisekerera; Amenewo ndawakonda kale.

title: 278 - Sinjira Yanga
content:
# 278 - Sinjira Yanga

    1. Sinjira yanga bi, Ngakhale ide bi; Tsogolerenitu, Mndisankhire njira, Ndisasankhe ndekha; Msandilekerere; Sankhireni Mbuye, Ndiyendemo bwino.   2. Ufumu ndifuna wanu, M’patse njira Yofitsa ku moyo Yolunjika kwanu Mndisungire cikho codzaza ndi moyo, Sankhireni abwenzi, Cuma pena tsoka   3. Sankhireni abwenzi, Nthenda pena thanzi; Musankhire ine condiyeneraco; Ndisandzisankhire cokula  cocepa Tsogolerenitu, Mndikwanire Mbuye

title: 279 - Idzani Kuno Kwa INe
content:
# 279 - Idzani Kuno Kwa INe

    1. Ha! Mtima wacisoni maso osaona, Mungathebe kukondwera mwa Yesu, Mbuyathu CHORUS: Idzani kwa INe nonsenu Inu akutodwa ndipo mudzapume Senza gori langa, phunzira Ndiri wofatsa mumtimamo, Mudzapumula m’myoyo yanu Bass, Tenor & Alto ’Dzanitu, ’dzani kuno ’dzanitu, nonsenu otodwa Alto; Inu akutodwa ndipo mudzapume. Bass & Tenor ’Dzanitu akutodwanu, mudzapumula. Alto, Tenro & Bass ’Dzanitu, senza gori, ’Dzanitu, phunziratu, Tenor & Bass Ndi wofatsa mtimamo, Mudzapumula m’moyo wanu.   2. Cimwemwe ca m’dzikoli sicikwanitsa’fe, Cikondi cikondwetsa, cikondi ca Yesu.   3. Cisomo copambana ca Yesu Kristuyo Cidzakhululukira olapa onsewo   4. Mtendere ngati mtsinje, cikondi ndi nyimbo Ndi gori lakufewa tipeza mwa Yesu.

title: 280 - Mfumu Yathu
content:
# 280 - Mfumu Yathu

    1. Nyimbo zathu zokoma, Tadza nazo lero, Kudzayamika Mbuye, Njira ndi moyowo CHORUS: Tiyimbatu kutamanda Mfumu (Mfumu) Tiyimbatu Ulemu kwa Mfumu.   2. Anakonda tiana pokhala pansiopo, Ngakhale ali m’mwamba amatikondabe.   3. TIkonda kumyimbira, Ndi kumva za Iye Pamene anakhala pa dziko kalelo   4. Mpulumutsi wodala, Tikugwadirani, Kuti mutithandize kukhulupiranu.

title: 281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino
content:
# 281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino

    1. Nyenyezi yabwino yowala ndi ulemerero wa m’mwamba Kuwala kwace kotsogoza anzeru napeza mwana CHORUS: Yowalayo, yowalayo, Nyenyezi yabwino m’phiri, Yowalayo, yowalayo, Cipulumutso ca Mlungu.   2. Mau anawadziwitsadi nthawi yafika ya nyenyezi, Anaitsata yowalayo  Ndi "Kristu nthanda ya m’mawa"   3. Nafe titsate monga iwo, Muni wa dziko wonenedwa’ Titsate monga iwo, Muni wa dziko wonenedwa; Titsate mpaka tikafike, Ku Mpumula wa kumwamba.

title: 282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi
content:
# 282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi

    1. Ha! Mingoli ndi maunso Alemekeza m’mwamba; Yesu m’mwambamo akondwa; Alamula ponsepo; Ali pa mpando uko; Yesu alamulira Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen   2. Krona wanu sabvulidwa, Mfumu yolemerera; Cikondi canu cosatha, Kwa anthu onse; Anthu anu okondwa Adzaona nkhopeyo Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen.   3. Ambuye idzani msanga tsikulo tilisowa Kudzamvetsera tsikulo, m’mwamba ndi dziko zatha’ Tidzaliza mingoli Ulemu kwa Mfumuyo. Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen.

title: 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
content:
# 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?

    1. Wina adzalowa pakhomo, Msanga posacedwa, Adzadya za ulemelero, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine? Podzakondwerera kosatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi Ndine? Wina adzayenda m’miseu, Nadzakhalandi masomphenya.   2. Wina adzatula katundu, Msanga Posacedwa Nadzalandiratu korona, Kodi ndiwe? Kondi ndine? Wina adzaonatu Mfumu, Atamasuka ku zadziko, Nadzakondwa naye k osatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   3. Wina ’dzagogoda citseko, Msanga Posacedwa Nadzamvatu, Sindikudziwa, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine? Poitana sadzamu yankha, Citseko citatsekedwatu, Ndipo sadzalandira mphotho; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   4. Wina adzaimbatu nyimbo, Msanga posacedwa Pamodzi ndi owomboledwa, Kodi ndiwe, kodi ndine? Wina adzakakondwerera, Ndi okondedwa pa dookolo, Ataomboledwa kosatha; kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

title: 284 - Popita Masikuwa
content:
# 284 - Popita Masikuwa

    1. Kuli anthu obvutika, Popita masikuwa, Kuli anthu akutopa, Popita masikuwa; Ngati tiwakondwetsa, Poyenda ulendowu Zabwino ticitetu, Popita masikuwa. CHORUS: Masiku apita, Masiku apita, Zabwino ticitetu! Popita masikuwa.   2. Kulibe nthawi yotaya, Popita masikuwa; Mukhale osangalala, Popita masikuwa; Dziko liri m’cisoni, Misozi ndi maliro; Thandiza obvutika, Popita masikuwa.   3. Zotimanga tizisiya, Popita masikuwa; Modzi ndi mmodzi atsala, Popita masikuwa Zabwino tidzakhala, ponse ponse zimera; Tidzakhala okondwa, Popita masikuwa.

title: 285 - Alipo Malo Opuma
content: # 285 - Alipo Malo Opuma

title: 286 - Nditengeni
content:
# 286 - Nditengeni 

 1. Ndifuna kuona nthawi Yonkha ku Ziyoni,Komwe tidzakhala bwino, Ku mudzi wa Yesu.CHORUS:Nditengeni tengeni, Ku ZiyoniKu mudzi wachikondiwo. Ku mudzi wa Yesu.2. Ndidzamva Aliluyayo Kwa khamu likuru;Ndikayimba nao nyimbo, Ya oomboledwa.3. Ndidzakamwone Israel Ndi Yesu Kalonga,Ndi mpando wa mfumu yanga Yemwe ’natilenga.4. Ndifuna ku Yerusalemu, Ku mudzi wa Mfumu,Ndifuna n’kadye zipatso Zotipatsa moyo.

title: 287 - M’Mayesoro Anga
content:
# 287 - M’Mayesoro Anga

    1. M’mayesero anga, Tate mndisunge; Ndisakukaneni, Kukusiyani, Pondenguma ine, Kumbukireni, Nsalekene nanu, Musanditaye.   2. Za dziko nzacabe, Ndisatengeke Cuma ca poyera, Cisandikope Kusunga kwani sisi, Ndikubvomera Ndikana zoipa zolakalaka.   3. Matsoka si anu, Zolabadira; Zowawa zikadza Kusokonzeza; Zikumphanitu Ndisacimwe bi; Nkhawa zanga zonse, Ndikupatsani.

title: 288 - Anadzatu Kwa Yesu
content:
# 288 - Anadzatu Kwa Yesu

    1. Anadzatu kwa Yesu ndi mphatso zaozo, Ndi Mtima wa cikondi Natula zonsezo Zokoma Mtima ntchito Zothandizanatu, Ndi zopereka zao Ndizo za mtengotu. CHORUS: Tulani mphatso zanu kwa Yesu Mbuyeyo Pereka Mtima wanu Pa guwa lacelo.   2. Pakati pa opatsa Naima mlendoyo Naona anthu ena Napatsa zaozo, Naye nalakalaka Kupatsa zacezo, Analibetu kanthu Kopatsa Mbuyeyo.   3. Nalira, Mbuye wanga, Wokoma Mtima ’Nu, Tengani Mtima wanga Wodzadza chimolo Ambuye namuyankha Usati yachepa; Yakoyo, mwana wanga Yaposa zonsezo.

title: 289 - Mundilandiretu
content:
# 289 - Mundilandiretu

    1. Kwa Inu YEsu ndilira; Wopanda Inu ndidzafa; Mundipulumutse Mbuye Mundilandiretu. CHORUS: Mundilandire, mundilandire Mundipulumutse Mbuye, mundilandiretu.   2. Ndine wocimwa kwambiri, Koma munafera ine; Mutha konse kundikonza, Mundilandiretu.   3. Sinditha kudzikonzatu, Ndingodzipereka ndekha; Ndipulumutseni nokha, Mundilandiretu.   4. Ndigwadira nsisi zanu, Ndioneni Ambuyanga; Yayambidwa ntchito yanu Mundilandiretu.

title: 290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito
content:
# 290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito

    1. Tikondwera pakugwira ntchito ya Ambuye mofunitsatu Yomwe mbuye wathu watipatsa, Tidzacita molimbikatu CHORUS: Pogwira  nchito, Timakondatu, timakondwatu Pogwira ntchito, m’munda wa Ambuyeyo. (Tenor and Bass) Pakugwira ntchito yace, timakondwatu, E, timakondwatu, Pakugwira ntchito yace m’munda wa Ambuyeyo   2. Mokondwra tidzanena nthano ya cikondi cace m’dzikoli Mu ulemerero wa Atate at ipatsa madalitso ’ce   3. Pomtsatira Mbuye wathu Yesu, Pakuyenda naye m’njiramo, Tidzatsogolera otaika, kuti anke kwa Ambuyeyo.

title: 291 - Ayenera Yesuyo
content:
# 291 - Ayenera Yesuyo

    1. Ayenera Yesuyo, Ayenera Yesuyo, Ayenera Yesuyo, Wophedwa. CHORUS: Yimba Aliluya! Tama aliluya! ’Lenu aliluya! Wophedwa!   2. Mpulumutsi idzani,  Wonongani ucimo, Zaka cikwi zifike, Yesuyo   3. Timve conco m’mtimamu, Kumyamika, kumkonda, Mpaka tilowe m’Mwamba Kum’wamba.

title: 292 - Timanja Tiwiri
content:
# 292 - Timanja Tiwiri

    1. Timanja tigwire ntchito yace, Lilime limlemekeze, Makuatu amve mau ace, Mau ayimbetu nyimbo CHORUS: Tidzatu, Ambuye, Tidzatu tikali ana, Tidzatu, Ambuye, Kumva za Inu.   2. Timapazi tiyende m’njirayo, Yopita nayo kumwamba; Timaso tiwerenge Bible, Linena cikondi cace.   3. Kamtima ndipereke kwa Yesu, Apulumutse moyowu Kuti ndigwire ntchitoyace, Ndikhaletu wace konse.

title: 293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo
content:
# 293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo

    1. Agogoda ndaniyo? Alindira, Abwino! Ndiye mlendo wacifundo, Wina palibe mnzace, Ine ndiri wozizwadi Nditsegulire khomo; Nditsegulire khomo.   2. Agogoda pompobe Alindira, Abwino! Citseko cilimbiranji Zitsotso zomelera Zomatirira zakuda, Zomamatira zonse, Zomamatira zonse,    3. Agogoda catani? Alindira Abwino; Indetu agogodabe Ndi cisoti ca minga Mpulumutsi alindabe, Kodi sungamlowetse; Kodi sungamlowetse?

title: 294 - Yang’ana Yesu
content:
# 294 - Yang’ana Yesu

   1. Yang’ana Yesu wosacimwa; Tate wampatsa moyo wace, Moyo wa imfa, ndi wa tsoka, Wandibveka ndi moyo wace, CHORUS: Moyo wacewu, Woyeretsa; Ine ndadziwa moyo wace; Moyo wa tsoka ndi wa imfa Moyo wangwiro ndabvekedwa   2. Zocimwa zanga zinampweteka, Chimo nloopsa lofiira, Mundibvundikire Inu Yesu, Ndipulumuke ciweruzo!   3. Ndilakalaka akhululuke Yesu ambveke zoyera; Ndatembenuka zanga ntaya, Ndalandiridwa mokondwera.   4. Ndayanjanadi ndi Mulungu, Ndayesedwatu wolungama; Ndayeretsedwa ndi mauwo Ndalemerera mwa Ambuye.

title: 295 - Mema Nkhondo
content:
# 295 - Mema Nkhondo

    1. Mema nkhondoyo, wadza mdaniyo, Kweza mbendera ya Mbuye. Konza zidazo, yimba nyimboyo, Khazikikatu pa Mulungu. CHORUS: Haya! ’nzathu, itilinda nkhondo, Limbatu, nkhondo nja Yesu Musafoke, m’thyole linga lao, Mbuye ndi kazembe wathuyo.   2. M’lake mdaniyo, m’yimbe m’njiramo, Mpaka nkhondoyo ileka Zida bvalani, mantha tayani, Pitikitsani adaniwo.   3. Mlungu, muvefe, m’patse mphamvuyo, M’tithandizetu, tipempha Nkhondo itatha, titagonjetsa, Mutipatse krona wa moyo.

title: 296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye
content:
# 296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye

   1. Mbuye, tsogolereni, Bwino, bwino panjira; Ndipezemo mtendere, Ndidzakhala wokondwa Mkatsogola ndiopa kuatika (Mbuye) Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Mbuye),   2. Thanthwe langa ndi Inu, Ndikabvutika m’moyo; Mukakhala pafupi, sindimaopa kanthu Mkatsogola, ndiopa kutaika (Mbuye), Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Ambuye),   3. Mtsogole mpaka komwe, Kudzathera zobvuta Dzikola la usana, Misozi adzacotsa Mkatsogola, Ndiopa kutaika (Mbuye) Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Ambuye)

title: 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda
content:
# 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda

    1. Mmodzi nalola kufa m’malo mwa ine, Wosayenera’ne ndikhale, Njira yopita ku mtanda anayenda Anandikhululukiradi. CHORUS: Zocimwa pa mtanda, Zocimwa pa mtanda, Anapirira koposadi! Nasauka nafa, Pa mtandapo Yesu! Anasenza macimo anga.   2. Wondikonda inetu, wacifundoyo, Potsuka Mtima wanga woda, Ndiribenso mulandu ndamasulidwa, Macimo atsala pa mtanda.   3. Mpulumutsi tsiku ndi tsiku, Nyimbo iri pakamwa ndi mu mtimanso, Kuti macimo acotsedwa.

title: 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu
content:
# 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu

    1. Ndinali nayotu nthawi Yowawa yacisoni, Ndinauza Yesu "Zonse nzanga ndiribe zanu," Ine ndiribe canu Ine ndiribe canu, Monyada ndinati "Zonse nzanga ndiribe canu."   2. Nandipeza, ndinamwona pa mtanda wopwetekwa Mtimabe unati, "zina n’zangatu zina n’zanu". Zina n’zanga ndi zanu, Zina n’zanga ndi zanu, Mtimabe unati "Zina n’zanga zina ndi zanu."   3. Tsiku ndi tsiku cifundo cace cinanditsitsa, Ndipo ndinati, "Ndicepe ndithu mukule Inu." Ndicepe ine ndithu, mukule Inu Mbuye, Ndipo ndinatu, "Ndicepe ndithu, mukule Inu."   4. Cokwera kuposa myamba, Kuya kuposa Nyanja Cikondi canu caposa Tiribe kanthu n’zanu Ndiribe zanga, Ndiribe zanga n’zanu. Cikondi canu coposa, "Tiribe kanthu n’zanu"

title: 299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse
content:
# 299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse

    1. Tikondwere nthawi zonse; Tidandauliranji Kwina "Tate wathu Mlungu, Atisamalirafe? CHORUS: Tikondwere nthawi zonse Ponse dzuwa liwala Njira ya ntchitoyi ndi yokoma Tikondwere konseko.   2. Dzanja  lace litsogoza, Ngati chimo lidzatu Nsisi zace, Satisiya tokha bi.  3. Tikaleka ntchito yathu, Tidzacita macimo, Ndipo mtambo wa cisoni, Udzaletsa cimwemwe.   4. Abwinowo akondwere, Ndi mtendere wosatha Timveretu mau ace, Tikonde zokomazo.

title: 300 - Mpumulo Kwa Otopa
content:
# 300 - Mpumulo Kwa Otopa

    1. Kwao Mkristu kwa ulemu, Ndi malo a mpumulo; Mpulumutsi anapita komwe Mtima ufuna CHORUS: Mpumulo kwa otopa, Mpumulo kwa otopa, Mpumulo kwa otopa; Mukapumadi; Patsidya pa Yordano, M’minda ya Edeneyo Muli mtengo wa moyo, Mukapumadi.   2. Akundimangira nyumba  Idzakhala muyaya Ndidzakhalitsatu uko, M’dzikolo la cimwemwe.   3. Zowawa sizidzalowa, Cisoni kulibenso; Koma m’kati mwa mtendere, Ndidzabvala korona    4. Imfa idzamarizidwa, Tsoka lidzacotsedwa; Adzapfuula mokondwa Pa tsiku la mdzukiro   5. Yimbani olowa m’Mwamba, Yimbani cigonjetso, Mukadzalowa m’ziyoni, Khoma mudzaliona.

title: 301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza
content:
# 301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza

    1. Ambuye ali pafupi kudza, Ndikumvaconcodi, Ndiponso nyenyezi zikuzima, Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu CHORUS: Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu! Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kuca ndithu! Usiku wathadi! Usana wadzanso. Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!   2. Zizindikiro za mlengalenga Zilalikiradi; Ndi za pa dziko zinena kuti Ambuye wayandikira   3. Ndi nthawi yoti kunyada kuthu Mu mpingo wonsewo; Ukhale wofulumira ntchito, Ukhale woyang’aniratu   4. Pitani msanga kukalalika Kwa osaukawo; Ndi kwa omveka a dziko lino; Onsewo afulumirenso.

title: 302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba
content:
# 302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba

    1. Mulungu wa kumwamba, tabwera kunoku, Ndi Mtima wokondwera kulowa m’nyumbayi Cifukwa ca zabwino mwacitazi Titokuyamikirani leroli. CHORUS: Inde tikuyamikani, Atate, leroli, Mwatimangira ’fe kuno kacisi wanuyu! Ndi ulemerero wanu mudzadze m’mnyumbayi; Muyeretse, mudalitse, munomu   2. Tikondwa tonse kukuthokozani ’Nu Poyamba kupemphera ndi kuyimbiramu Mom’muno nsiku zonse mukhale nafetu Monga nd angelo anu m’mwambamo.   3. Ikhale ngati nyali, yowala m’nyumbayi, Yakutsogoza onse opunthwa m’mdima bii, Akunja ndi Akhristu mwapulumutse ndi kuunika koturuka munomu.

title: 303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo
content:
# 303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo

    1. Kale anthu m’kholamo, Napembedza Mwanayo CHORUS: Ndiye Mbuye, Mfuma yanga, Ndiye Mbuye, wakumwamba, Amgwadire anthuwo, Timtamande Mfumuyo.   2. Wosauka Iyedi, Anagwira ntchitozi.   3. Ndani kodi munthuyo, Woyesedwa m’bwinjamo?  4. Analira ndaniyo, Pomwalira bwenzilo?   5. M’munda muna ndaniyo, Mwazi wace dotho do?   6. Iye ndani m’ndamo, Anafera ’daniwo?   7. Mkuca wace ndaniyo, Waturuka m’mandamo?   8. Ndani alikudzako, Mponda wakuyeramo?

title: 304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako
content:
# 304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako

    1. Atate wa kumwambako, Munaombla ife ndi Cikondi canu cijaco, Tiyamikira inutu.   2. Ambuye Yesu ndinutu, Munabadwira anthu ’fe Munatifera tonse fe, Tiyamikira Inutu   3. Mzimu woyera m’timamo, Tiyeretsedwe ndinunso, Munatisunga bwinoli, Tiyamikira Inutu.   4. Atate, Mwana, Mzimunso, Ndinu atatu mmodzitu, Ocimwa tinipemphhako, Mutikhululukire ’fe.

title: 305 - Dzuwa Lapita
content:
# 305 - Dzuwa Lapita

    1. Dzuwa lapita, Dzuwa lapita, Mlungu mutigonetswe phe!   2. Mdima wafika, mdima wafika, Mutisunge tonse bwino.   3. Tibvomereze, tibvomereze, Zakucimwa zathu zonse.   4. Mkhululukire, mkhululukire, Zoipazi zathu zonse.   5. Lero tigone lero tigone Tigonemo mu mtendere   6. Ndife ananu, Ndife ananu, "Tate Mlungu wotikonda.

title: 306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu
content:
# 306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu

    1. Yesu adzaweruzatu Pomwe liwala dzuwapo Wace ufumu ukhala Mpaka ku nthawi zonsezo   2. Anthu m’mitundu yonseyo Adzayimbira dzinalo Ndi ana onse ayimba, Hosana kwa Mulunguyo   3. Kwa Iye apempheratu Kulemekeza Mbuyeyo Ndi dzina lace likwera Mongatu nsembe mmwambamo  4. Ndi anthu onse pansipo Alemekeze Mfumuyo, Ndipo angelo ayimba, Ayankhe onsewo, Amen.

title: 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo
content:
# 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo

    1. Munthu wa zisoniyo, Timcha dzina lacelo, Mpulumutsi dzinanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.   2. Anapeputsidwako, Nandifera m’mtandamo Anandiombolayo, Aleluya, ndinu Yesu.  3. Anapacikidwatu, Natha nchito yace myu! Anakwera mmwamba du! Aleluya, ndinu Yesu   4. Adzabwera Iyenso, Kudzatenga acewo Nyimbo tidzayimbanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.

title: 308 - Polenga Dzikoli
content:
# 308 - Polenga Dzikoli

    1. Polenga dzikoli, Pakumva Inudi, Kwayeratu; Mumve pemperoli, Ndipo pamenepa, Palibe mauwo, Muwaletu.   2. Inu wakudzatu Kuwaciritsadi A nthendawo; Kupatsa moyowo, Kuona m’masomo, pa anthu onsewo, Muwaletu.   3. Mzimu woonadi, Ndi wa cikondico, Idzanitu Mwamba mulengemo, Pali za mdimazo, Pa dziko ponsepo, Muwaletu   4. Inu Atatuwo, Wodala Mlunguyo, Timveretu, Malengedwewo, Mdima ukhalamo, Mutume mauwo Muwaletu

title: 309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye
content:
# 309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye

    1. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndikondwa nthawi zonsezo Ndipeza ciyanjano caceco, Ndikwanitsidwa ndi Iye. CHORUS: Ndiyende naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndifuna atsogoze ’ne Pokagamira pa Mplumutsiyo Sinditaika konse bi   2. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndicite cifuniro ’ce. Analonjeza kuthangata ’be, Adzakwanitsa zonsezo.   3. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndabvomereza chimolo, Pamodzi tidzayenda konseko, Mu ciyanjano caceco.

title: 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu
content:
# 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu

    1. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kuyang’ana nkhope yace, Adzaze mtimanga cisomo cace, Ndifuna kukhala naye. CHORUS: Khala pafupi, mfupi nd Yesu, Pa mbali ya Iyeyo; Kuyang’ana pa nkhope yabwinoyo, Ndifuna kukhala naye.   2. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kumtsata pafupifupi Ndi kuti ndimvetse polankhula ’Ye, ponena lonjezo lace.   3. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Pafupi masiku onse Pogwiratu dzanja la mphamvu yace, Nkalowa m’ufumu wace.

title: 311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu
content:
# 311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu

    1. E, Mzimu wa Mulungu, ’Nu, Mukhale m’mtimanga; Ndi zangazo ndipatsatu Kwa Inu, Mbuyanga CHORUS: Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Mdzaze Mzimu Woyera ’Nu, Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Wanu ndikhaletu.   2. Ndifunatu kucitadi Kufuna kwanuko; Sin’funa kanthu kena bi, Mndidzaze, mtimamo,   3. Ndilibe kanthu kabwino, Kopatsa Inuyo; Mutsuke Mtima wangawo, Ndi mwazi wanuwo.

title: 312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa
content:
# 312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa

    1. Tainanidwatu, Kuli mtsinje Yordano; Ife tinamvadi Mau mcipululumo CHORUS: Ife tafikadi Kubatizidwamo, Kuti titsukidwa Mphululupulu zathuzo.   2. Tamva Uthangawo, Wa cikondi caceco Lapani m’mtimamo, Yesu ali kudzanso   3. Yesu anenanso, Yemwe akhulupira, Nabatizidwa ’ye, Adzapulumukadi.   4. Tiyamikiratu Nsisi zace Yesuyo; Watiturusadi Mdima wa zoipazo.

title: 313 - Pa Ubatizo
content:
# 313 - Pa Ubatizo

    1. Atate muwapenye Anzathu onsewo; Abvomereza dzina La Yesu Kristuyo; Alonjezetsa lero Kutsata Mbuyeyo, Mwathangatire iwo Asabwererenso.   2. Onsewa afa ndithu M’zoipa zawozo; Tsopano aikidwa Ndi Kristu m’mandamo; Auke iwo onse Kuyenda nayeyo; Aphe nthawi zonse Ndi kudya mauwo.   3. Muwalimbitse, Mbuye, Kuyenda m’njirayi, Ndi kugonetsa mdani Masiku onsewo; Muwathangate iwo Kukopa enawo, Amene ali kufa M’zoipa zawozo.

title: 314 - Anyamata Inu
content:
# 314 - Anyamata Inu

    1. Anyamata inutu, Atsikana inunso, Muti, Tingavcitenji, Ang’ono ndifetu, Kuthandiza ufumu Wa Yesu?   2. Aphunzitse anthuwo, Awalalikiredi, Akukhala moipa Mu mdima wakunja, Alowetu m’ufumu Wa Yesu.   3. E! ang’ono ndifetu, Nzeru sizimafika, Kuti tingaphunzitse, Titani tonse ’fe Kuthandiza ufumu wa Yesu?   4. Inu nonse, anzanga, Tingoganiza bwino, Tinganene mofatsa, Timverenso, Mbuye, Kuthandiza ufumu Wa Yesu.   5. Pothandiza amathu, Pakwakonda anzathu, Pakusiya zoipa, Pkhaladi bwino, Tithandiza ufumu Wa Yesu.

title: 315 - Mmene Ine Ndiri Mwana
content:
# 315 - Mmene Ine Ndiri Mwana

    1. Mmene ine ndiri mwana Ndzaphunzira zacezo; Ndidzamtsata Yesu yekha, M’njira ya mabvutoyo      CHORUS: Inde, Yesu andikonda, Ine ndikudziwadi Kuti Yesu andikonda, Nandiferakelelo.   2. Ndzanka komwe andiuza Sinnacepe konse bi, Pakuyenda m’njira yace, Pena mcifuniro ’ce.   3. Iye Mpopulumukira Kwa zoipa zathuzo, Iye anditsogolera, Ndikalowe mmambamo.

title: 316 - Tiri Otumika
content:
# 316 - Tiri Otumika

    1. Tiri otumika A Yesu Kristuyo, Tapangana tidzagwira ntchito ya Ambuye CHORUS: Ndifetu! Ndifetu! Otumikawo Ndifetu! Ndifetu! A Ambuyeyo Tsiku liri lonseli, caka ncakanso, Tidzagwira ntchito yace, otumika ’fe.   2. Anyamata onsewo, atsikananso, Tisatsate dziko lino, koma Yesu mwini   3. Akufunatu onsewo m’nchito yaceyo, Tionetse za cikondi ndi cisomo cace.   4. Mpaka Yesu adzanso, tidzagwirabe Tifuna kudzamva mau, "Munacita bwino".

title: 317 - Anakwatira Kale
content:
# 317 - Anakwatira Kale

    1. Anakwatira kale Pa Eden pajapo; Ulipo lero lino, Mdalitso womwewo   2. Awiri aimamu, Mwamma ndi mkaziyu, O! Mzimu wakuyera Mdalitso mpatsetu.   3. Mulunzanitse awa, Atate leroli; Munakwatits’ Adamu ndi Hava kalelo.   4. Mukhale nawo Yesu Mongatukaleko, Ukwati mnadalitsa Pa Kana pajapo.   5. Mwasunge, mwayendetse Mu njira yanuyo, Akhale ndi kudala Pa banja pawopo.

title: 318 - Tsiku La Sabata
content:
# 318 - Tsiku La Sabata

    1. Tsiku la Sabatalo, Mlungu nalipatula; Atalenga zonsezo, Mbuye napumulanso. CHORUS: Tsiku la Sabatalo, Mlungu nalidalitsa; Kukumbutsa ife za mphamvu ya kulengayo.   2. Musafune za dziko, Ndi zokondweretsa Kuli zopambanadi M’dziko la kumwambako.   3. Pakuyamba tsikulo, Loweruka madzulo Tisonkhane tonsefe, Kuyimbira Mbuyeyo.   4. Tipemphere nsisizo, Ndi gonjetso lacelo, Kuti athangate, ’fe Kulisunga tsikulo.

title: 319 - Ndidzayimba Za Mulungu
content:
# 319 - Ndidzayimba Za Mulungu

    1. Ndidzayimba za Mulungu Za Kukonda kwaceko Watumiza mwana wavce, Kundifera kalelo CHORUS: Inde ndidzayimba nyimbo, Ya kukonda kwaceko, Ndidzayimba ndi angelo, Akukhala m’mwambamo. (Bass, Alto, ndi Tenor): Yimbatu, ndiyimba nyimbo; Kondako, kondako, yimbatu; Angelo omwe, Akukala m’mwambamo, E, M’mwambamo   2. Ndinacita mphulupulu, Waiwala zonsezo, Ndinakhala ndi zoipa, Wazicotsa zonsezo   3. Wandipatsa moyo wace, Moyo wakuyera mbu, Ine ndiri mwana wace, Wandilera inetu.   4. Ndiyamika Mbuye wanga, Ndidzamlemekezatu, Ndipititsa mbiri yace, Ya kukonda kwaceku.

title: 320 - Yesu Wathu Mbuyeyo
content:
# 320 - Yesu Wathu Mbuyeyo

    1. Yesu wathu Mbuyeyo alandira onsewo Akuipa omwewo, Osocera mtarimo. CHORUS: Yimba kawiri ndi kawirinso, Yesu Ambuye sakanatu, Mvetsa uthenga wabwinowo, Wakucimwa adzetu (Bass ndi Tenor) Yimba, yimbatu, Yimba, yimbatu Yesu Ambuye, indetu, sakanatu, sakanatu; Mvetsa, mvetsadi, E, wabwinowo, Wakucimwa adzetu,   2. Idzatu kwa YEsu, apumitsa inunso, Inde m’tima mwanumo ndi mtendere wacewo.   3. Walandira inetu tsiku lija kalelo, Wanditsuka ine mbu m’mtima mwanga momwemo.   4. Wandifera Yesuyo pansi pano kalelo, Sindiopa mlanduwo pakubwera Iyeyo.

title: 321 - Mvamva Mau A Mulungu
content:
# 321 - Mvamva Mau A Mulungu

    1. Mwamva mau a Mulungu, Mukabvomeranjiko? Kodi musanduka Mtima, Ndikumvera Yesuyo? CHORUS: Bvomerani, bvomerani, Bvomerani msangatu (etu) Musacedweranso ai, Landirani Yesuyo.   2. Munacita nthantha kale, Musacedweransobi; Yesu ali kulindira, Inu sadzakanai.   3. Musaope kaamba zinthu Zakuipa zanuzo; Mukakhulupira Yesu, Akacotsa zonsezo.   4. Pelekeni Mtima wanu, Kwa Mulungu wathuyo, Mkhulupire kuti Yesu, Watifera kalelo.

title: 322 - Mau Ngonyozekatu
content:
# 322 - Mau Ngonyozekatu

    1. Mau ngonyozekatu, Anenedwa msanganso; Timaiwaladi, Komabe pa mlanuwo Adzatinenezafe, Poweruza Mlunguyo.   2. Ife timalankhula, Mosaganiziratu, Mau akunyadawo, Ndi obisa chimolo, Mau akukwiyanso, Ndi onena enawao.   3. Mbuye tipatsenife, Mphamvu yodikirayo, Mtisogoze, Mbuye’Nu, Tisacimwe m’mauwo, Mmwamba tidzaimbetu, Nyimbo zoyamika’Nu

title: 323 - Mbuye Ndapangana
content:
# 323 - Mbuye Ndapangana

    1. Mbuye ndapangana M’njira yanuyi, Kuti ndidzayenda Osalekai, Mundipatse Mtima Wopiriramo Wakukana zonse zondipingazo.   2. Mzimu wakuipa Undiyesa ’ne Mundithangatire Kuthawitsabe Akandisautsa Kumudzi kunoku Mulowetse mphamvu M’mtima mwangamu   3. Akathira nsembe Ku mizimuyo, Ndipenyere kwanu Ee, Kumwambako, Tsoka ndi zonyenga Za ufitizo Yesu, mndilimbitse, Ndisaopezo.   4. Pena kumwa nao, Ndisateroko, Pena kukaona Za kubvinazo, Pena kuombeza Sindifunai; Yesu mndithandize Kuzikanazi.   5. Ndinu Mbusa wanga, Mndithandizetu, Ndisaipse nazo Mtima wangawu. Osaopa konse, osacimwa bi, Mndiyendetse Yesu M’njira yanuyi.

title: 324 - T’yimbe Nyimbo Yotikondwetsa
content:
# 324 - T’yimbe Nyimbo Yotikondwetsa

    1. T’yimbe nyimbo yotikondwetsa m’njiramo, Tidzafika kwathu msangatu; Ndipo posacedwa usiku ’dzapita, Posacedwa tidzafikako. CHORUS: Posacedwatu posacedwatu, Tidzafika tsidyalo "Dzakomana" fe potha anamondwewa Posacedwa tidzafikako.   3. Tidzagwira ntchito imene tipeza Tidzafika kwathu kwathu msangatu Adzatilimbitsa mwa nsisi zacezo Posacedwa tidzafikako.   4. Tidzakonza njira kwa anthu otopa, Tidzafika kwathu msangatu Tidzakopa anthu m’cikondi caceco Posacedwa tidzafikako   5. Tidzapumuladi pa tsidya la myanja Tidzafika kwathu msangatu Anthu sadzalira mu mzinda wowala Posacedwa tidzafikako.

title: 325 - Pakupempha Ife Pano
content:
# 325 - Pakupempha Ife Pano

    1. Pakupempha ife pano, pakwitana "Tateyo, Podziwitsa m’tima mwanga, bwratu kwa Mbuyeyo CHORUS: Idzatu, idzatu, kwa Mbuyathu Yesudi, Idzatu, idzatu, iwe bwera leroli.   2. Unacimwacimwa ndithu, wasocera mtarimo, Unacedweranji kudza pa kulinda Yesuyo?  3. M’dziko lino pansi pano sukapeza kanth;umo Kokkwanitsa Mtima wako, bweratu kwa Mbuyeyo.   4. Bvumbulutsa zonse zako zobisika m’mtimamo, Ayeretsa moyo wako nao mwazi wacewo.

title: 326 - Mpingo Wa Akristu ’Fe
content:
# 326 - Mpingo Wa Akristu ’Fe

    1. Mpingo wa Akristu ’fe, tikondwra mwa Ambuye Tinka m’dziko labwino, tikondwera mwa Ambuye. CHORUS: Mpulumutsi, Mtitsogoze bwino bwino, Pakupita kunka mmwambamo.   2. Timayenda bwinotu, tikondwera mwa Ambuye Tigonjetsa mdaniyo, tikondwera mwa Ambuye.   3. Msanga tidzapumadi, tikondwera mwa Ambuye Tidzabvala kronayo, tikondwra mwa Ambuye.

title: 327 - Alikuitana Uko Tsidyalo
content:
# 327 - Alikuitana Uko Tsidyalo

    1. Alikuitana uko tsidyalo, Tumizani mauawo, Iwo akufuna Mpulumutsiyo, Tumiza mauwo. CHORUS (Bass): Tibukitse mau acewo, Ndi mitima yonseyo Pakumlemekeza Mlunguyo, Ndi kusunga mwauwo, Tuma mau a uthengawo, Kuli konse amvetu, Tuma mau a uthengawo, Osaleka konse bi. (Tibukitse mau acewo, Ndi mitima yakufunatu, Pakumlemekeza Mlunguyo, Ndi kusunga mau acewo Tuma mau a uthengawo, Kuli konse amvetu, Tuma mau a uthengawo, Osaleka konse bi.   2. Tamva kuitana tsidya lijalo, Tumiza mauwo, Tipereke za cifundo zathuzo, Tumiza mauwo.   3. Tipempheretu cisomo caceco, Tumiza mauwo, Mzimu wa Ambuye anke ponsepo, Tumiza mauwo.   4. Tisaleme pakucita zabwino, Tumiza mauwo, Pakukopa anthu osocerawo, Tumiza mauwo.

title: 328 - NATIONAL ATHEM (Chichewa)
content:
# 328 - NATIONAL ATHEM (Chichewa)

     1. Mlungu dalitsani Malawi,    Mumsunge m’mtendere,    Khonjetsani adani onse,    Njala nthenda nsanje,    Lunzitsani mitima yathu,    Kuti tisaope,    Mdalitse mtsogoleri nafe,    Ndi Mayi Malawi,    2. Malawi dziko lokongola,Lachonde ndi ufulu,Nyanja ndi mphepo ya m’mapiri,Ndithudi tadala,Zigwa, mapiri, nthaka, DzinthuMphatso zaulereNkhalango, madambo abwinoNgokoma Malawi.3. O’ Ufulu tigwirizane,Kukweza MalawiNdi chikondi, khama kumvera,TimutumikirePa nkhondo nkana pa mtendereCholinga n’chimodziMayi, Bambo, tidziperekePokweza Malawi

title: 329 - Ndikonda Kuti Atate
content:
# 329 - Ndikonda Kuti Atate

    1. Ndikondwa kuti Atate wathu, Atidziwitsa cikondi cace, Pakuwerenga m’kalata mwace, Yesu, amati akonda ine. CHORUS: Ndikondwerera kuti YEsu Akonda ’ne, akonda ’ne. Ndikondwerera kuti Yesu Akonda inenso.   2. Nkana ndingamuiwale Iye, Ndikusocera kutaritari, Andikondabe masiku onse Ndikabwereranso kwa Iyeyo   3. Pakudzamona Ambuyangayo M’ulemerero wa kumwambako Ndzayimba kosalekeza konse, Ndikondwa Yesu akonda ine.

title: 330 - Lemekeza Mlungu Tate
content:
# 330 - Lemekeza Mlungu Tate

    1. Lemekeza Mlungu ’tate, Lemekeza Mwananso, Lemekeza, Mlungu Mzimu, Mlungu Mmodzi mkuruyo; Lemekeza, lemekeza, Mlungu wathu yemweyo.   2. Mlemekeze, anaconda, Natisuka m’mtimamo, Anatiombola ife, Tikhale nayeyo; Lemekeza, lemekeza, Yesu Mbuye nsembeyo.   3. Lemekeza Mfumu yathu, Mfumu, Mlengi wathuyo, Apambana anthu onse, Pansi ndi kumwambako; Lemekeza, lemekeza, Mfumu ya mafumuyo.

title: 331 - Tamani Mlungu Mtimamo
content:
# 331 - Tamani Mlungu Mtimamo

    1. Tamani Mlungu mtimamo, Wakundifera pansipo, Nafafaniza chimolo, Nanditengera dipole. CHORUS: Wandiombola inetu, Potaya mwazi wacewo Timlemekeza Iyetu, Wotipilira dipole   2. Ndinasocera kalelo, Ndamkana Iye Yesuyo Koma ndiyimba leroli, Wandiombola inedi.   3. Cikondwerero ciripo, Popenyetsetsa Yesuyo, Pa mtanda pace pomwepo, Pakundifera inenso.   4.  Ndiribe ntchito zangazo, Kukoma Mtima wangawo Anandiyesa inetu, Wakulungama Yesuyo.   5. Tsono mubwere inunso, Mombolo wanu ndiyedi Apulumutsa onsewo, Okhulupira Yesuyo.

title: 332 - Pakukhala Pa Mgonero
content:
# 332 - Pakukhala Pa Mgonero

    1. Pakukhala pa mgonero, Wa Ambuye wathuyo, Tionetu mwazi wanu, Muja unakheramu Nkana singaone Inu, Muli mfupi nafedi, Mutsangalatse, Mbuye    2. Mutiuze ife nthano Ya mabvuto anuwo, Pakuyembekeza Inu, Tisendeza kwanuko Mtikokere mfupi ndi ’Nu, Ndi ku mtanda wanuwo, Mpaka tidzaone tokha, Monga munaona ’fe.   3. Pakucoka pa mgonero, Wa Ambuye wathuyo, Moyo wathu ufanane, Ndi wa Mbuye wathuyo, Pakutsanza moyo wace, Tisanduka Iyeyo. Timuchula wathu, Pakumvera mau ’ce.

title: 333 - Tikagwidwa Ndi Cisoni
content:
# 333 - Tikagwidwa Ndi Cisoni

    1. Tikagwidwa ndi cisoni, Ikayendanso misozi, Poliriratu abale, Yesu mutimveretu.   2. Munabvala thupi lathu, Munadziwa masauko Mnalirira bwenzi lanu, Yesu mutimveretu.   3. Mmene imfa yathu idza, Mwenya wathu ukaleka Mmene ife timwalira, Yesu mutiveretu.   4. Mnamwalira Inu paja, Mwazi wanu munataya, Inu munagona m’manda, Yesu mutimveretu.

title: 334 - Mmene Ine Ndisauka
content:
# 334 - Mmene Ine Ndisauka

    1. Mnene ine ndisauka Ndi zoipa zangazo Ndidzapita kwa Mulungu, Adzandilandiratu CHORUS: Mlungu adzalandira, Iye ndiye Atate wanga, Watumiza Mwana wace, Anandifera kalelo.   2. Ngati atsamwali anga sandikonda ine bi. Ndikhulupirire Mlungu, Iye sandikanai.   3. Pansi pano ndiri mlendo, Kwathu ndi kumwambako, Mmene adzabwera Yesu Ndidzapita komweko.

title: 335 - Pofunafuna M’malembo Ace
content:
# 335 - Pofunafuna M’malembo Ace

    1. Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Pofuna Mpulumutsiyo, Momwe tikumva za Ambuye, Bible amati c’ani ko? CHORUS: Pita, kafunse, ati Mfumu, Ka’mba ka iwe, ndinetu Pita, gogoda khomo lace, Komwe udzapumulako.   2. Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Tiri kufuna njirayo Yonka ku mzinda wopambana, Bible amati c’ani ko?   3. Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Pofuna otaikawo, Kuwatsogoza kwa Ambuye, Bible amati c’ani ko?

title: 336 - Usikuwo Woyerawo
content:
# 336 - Usikuwo Woyerawo

    1. Usikuwo woyerawo, Mwana adamlerayo, Akakhale Mfumuyo, Anabadwa m’kholamo Mfumu ya Mafumu, Ndi ya anthuwo.   2. Mwanayo wa Mulunguyo, Andikonda inetu, Nantayira cumaco, Nadzagona M’udzumo, Ndiyamika Mbuye Wanga Yesuyo   3. Usikuwo woyerawo, Nudzatu Mtenderewo, Ife tonse anthuwo, Atitenga Mlunguyo; Mlemekeze "Tate, Mwana, Mzimunso.

title: 337 - Pamene Ndizaukanso
content:
# 337 - Pamene Ndizaukanso

    1. Pamene ndidzaukanso tsikulo, Komwe kulibe mdima konse bi. Ee! Ulemerero ’dzawaliramo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu. CHORUS: Ndidzakwanitsidwatu, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu Pamene ndidzaukanso tsikulo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   2. Pamene ndidzamuona Iyeyo, Nandilandira mokondweratu, Pakumva cisomo ca Ambuyeyo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   3. Poklomana nawo okondedwawo Omwe mwa imfa nandisiya ’ne, Pomwepo ineyo ndidzamtama ’Ye, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   4. Ndidzamuona Yesu posacedwatu, Iye amene nandifera ’ne  Ndidzamuyimbira kosalekadi, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu

title: 338 - Utsegule Pa Khomo
content:
# 338 - Utsegule Pa Khomo

    1. Utsegule pa khomo, kuti Yesu alowe; Ndi ngati ulola ’dzacotsa chimo Tsegula mtimawo

title: 339 - Mpatse Yesuu Mtima Wako
content:
# 339 - Mpatse Yesuu Mtima Wako

    1. Mpatse Yesu Mtima wako wonsewo, Alikuitana iwe Mbuyeyo Mpatse Yesu Mtima wako leroli; Mpatsetu mtimawo.

title: 340 - Taya Zobvuta Zako
content:
# 340 - Taya Zobvuta Zako

     Taya zobvuta zako, Taya zobvuta zako Ambuye adzacotsa zonsezo, Taya zobvuta zako.

title: 341 - Mdzaze ’Ne Ndi Mzimu
content:
# 341 - Mdzaze ’Ne Ndi Mzimu

  Mdzadze ’ne ndi Mzimu, Mzimu wanu, Mbuye. Mundipange wanuyo, Mdzaze ’ne ndi Mzimu.

title: 342 - Mbuye, Mumvetu Pempho Lathu
content:
# 342 - Mbuye, Mumvetu Pempho Lathu

  Mbuye, mumvetu Pempho lathulo, Mtipatse tonsefe Mtendere wanu. Amen

title: 343 - Mticitire Cifundo
content:
# 343 - Mticitire Cifundo

  Mticitire cifuno, Ambuye, Mtithandize kusunga lamulo. Amen

title: 344 - Usiku Unowu
content:
# 344 - Usiku Unowu

  Usiku unowu, Mtisunge Mbuyathu, Angelo asamale ’fe, Kufikira mawa. Amen.

title: 345 - Mmene Tipita Kwathu
content:
# 345 - Mmene Tipita Kwathu

  Mmene tipita kwathu, Mbuye, Mutidalitse m’njira zathu; Mtisogolere tsiku lonse, Kuti tilowe kumwambako.

title: 346 - Ambuye Ali M’nyumba Yace
content:
# 346 - Ambuye Ali M’nyumba Yace

  Ambuye ali m’nyumba yace, M’kacisi wace wakuyera, Akhale cete onse, Akhale cete pa maso pace. Akhale mwa cete, mu nyumbayi. Amen.

title: 347 - Patseni Wina Mbuyanga
content:
# 347 - Patseni Wina Mbuyanga 

  Patseni wina, Mbuyanga, Yosowa Inuyo  Ndicite mbali yangatu, Kumkopa iyeyo.  Kumkopa iyeyo; Kumkopa iyeyo;  Ndicite mbali yangatu, Kumkopa iyeyo.

title: 348 - Yang’anani Kwa Yesu
content:
# 348 - Yang’anani Kwa Yesu 

  Yang’anani Yesu, Ee! Yang’anitsitsani ’Ye! Ndipo za pa dziko zizimadi, Pakuona kuwala kwace.

title: 349 - Mu Mtimanga
content:
# 349 - Mu Mtimanga 

 Mu mtimanga, mu mtimanga, Lowani, Ambuye Yesu Lowanitu, mukhalemo, Lowani, Ambuye Yesu.

title: 350 - Mutitsitsimutse
content:
# 350 - Mutitsitsimutse 

  Mutitsitsimutse, Ambuyathu Yesu,Mutitsitsimutse, Muyambire inetu.
